trans-unit.source: An ideal trySplit method efficiently (without traversal) divides its elements exactly in half, allowing balanced parallel computation. Many departures from this ideal remain highly effective; for example, only approximately splitting an approximately balanced tree, or for a tree in which leaf nodes may contain either one or two elements, failing to further split these nodes. However, large deviations in balance and/or overly inefficient trySplit mechanics typically result in poor parallel performance.
trans-unit.target: 理想的 trySplit 方法可以有效地（无遍历）将其元素精确地分成两半，从而实现平衡的并行计算。许多偏离这一理想的做法仍然非常有效。例如，仅对近似平衡的树进行近似拆分，或者对于其中叶节点可能包含一个或两个元素的树，无法进一步拆分这些节点。但是，平衡的大偏差和/或 trySplit 力学效率过低通常会导致较差的并行性能。

trans-unit.source: An ideal trySplit method efficiently (without traversal) divides its elements exactly in half, allowing balanced parallel computation. Many departures from this ideal remain highly effective; for example, only approximately splitting an approximately balanced tree, or for a tree in which leaf nodes may contain either one or two elements, failing to further split these nodes. However, large deviations in balance and/or overly inefficient trySplit mechanics typically result in poor parallel performance.
trans-unit.target: 理想的 trySplit 方法可以有效地（无遍历）将其元素精确地分成两半，从而实现平衡的并行计算。许多偏离这一理想的做法仍然非常有效。例如，仅对近似平衡的树进行近似拆分，或者对于其中叶节点可能包含一个或两个元素的树，无法进一步拆分这些节点。但是，平衡的大偏差和/或 trySplit 力学效率过低通常会导致较差的并行性能。

trans-unit.source: An image encoded as part of a file or stream may be thought of extending out in multiple dimensions: the spatial dimensions of width and height, a number of bands, and a number of progressive decoding passes. This class allows a contiguous (hyper)rectangular subarea of the image in all of these dimensions to be selected for decoding. Additionally, the spatial dimensions may be subsampled discontinuously. Finally, color and format conversions may be specified by controlling the ColorModel and SampleModel of the destination image, either by providing a BufferedImage or by using an ImageTypeSpecifier.
trans-unit.target: 可以将编码为文件或流的一部分的图像视为在多个维度上扩展：宽度和高度的空间维度，多个波段以及多个渐进式解码遍历。此类允许选择所有这些维度的图像的连续（超）矩形子区域进行解码。另外，空间尺寸可以不连续地被子采样。最后，可以通过控制目标图像的 ColorModel 和 SampleModel 来指定颜色和格式转换，方法是提供 BufferedImage 或使用 ImageTypeSpecifier 。

trans-unit.source: An immutable TypeInfo object that represents the type of the current element. Note that the caller can keep references to the obtained TypeInfo longer than the callback scope. Otherwise, this method returns null if the validator is unable to determine the type of the current element for some reason (for example, if the validator is recovering from an earlier error.)
trans-unit.target: 一个不可变的 TypeInfo 对象，它表示当前元素的类型。请注意，调用方可以将对获取的 TypeInfo 的引用保留的时间长于回调范围。否则，如果验证器由于某种原因无法确定当前元素的类型（例如，如果验证器正在从先前的错误中恢复），则此方法返回null。

trans-unit.source: An immutable TypeInfo object that represents the type of the specified attribute. Note that the caller can keep references to the obtained TypeInfo longer than the callback scope. Otherwise, this method returns null if the validator is unable to determine the type.

trans-unit.source: An implementation can favor responding to an interrupt over normal method return in response to a signal, or over indicating the elapse of the specified waiting time. trans-unit.source: An implementation dependent warning that may be raised if the configuration parameter "namespaces" is set to true and an unbound namespace prefix is encountered in an entity's replacement text. Raising this warning is not enforced since some existing parsers may not recognize unbound namespace prefixes in the replacement text of entities.
trans-unit.target: 如果将配置参数“ namespaces ”设置为 true 并且在实体的替换文本中遇到未绑定的命名空间前缀，则可能会产生与实现相关的警告。由于某些现有的解析器可能无法识别实体的替换文本中未绑定的名称空间前缀，因此不会强制发出此警告。

trans-unit.source: An implementation is not required to provide a way to start agents from the command-line interface. When it does, then it supports the -javaagent option as specified above. The premain methods will be called in the order that the agents are specified on the command line. More than one agent may use the same
trans-unit.target: 不需要实现即可提供从命令行界面启动代理的方法。如果这样做，则它支持上面指定的 -javaagent 选项。该 -javaagent 选项可以在同一命令行多次使用，从而开始多个代理。所述 premain 方法将在该试剂在命令行上指定的顺序调用。一个以上的代理可以使用相同的代理

trans-unit.source: An implementation may (and typically does) require that the current thread hold the lock associated with this Condition when this method is called. trans-unit.source: An implementation may choose to not execute the stream pipeline (either sequentially or in parallel) if it is capable of computing the count directly from the stream source. In such cases no source elements will be traversed and no intermediate operations will be evaluated. Behavioral parameters with side-effects, which are strongly discouraged except for harmless cases such as debugging, may be affected. For example, consider the following stream:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个实现能够直接从流源计算计数,那么它可以选择不执行流管道(顺序或并行)。在这种情况下,不会遍历源元素,也不会评估任何中间操作。具有副作用的行为参数,除了调试等无害情况外,强烈不鼓励使用,可能会受到影响。例如,考虑以下流。

trans-unit.source: An implementation may choose to restrict some header names or values, as the HTTP Client may determine their value itself. For example, "Content-Length", which will be determined by the request Publisher. In such a case, an implementation of HttpRequest.Builder may choose to throw an IllegalArgumentException if such a header is passed to the builder.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现可以选择限制某些标头名称或值，因为HTTP客户端可以自行确定它们的值。例如，“内容长度”，将由请求发布者确定。在这种情况下，如果将这样的标头传递给生成器，则 HttpRequest.Builder 的实现可以选择引发 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: An implementation may offer better algorithmic performance when val == this.
trans-unit.target: 当 val == this 时，实现可以提供更好的算法性能。

trans-unit.source: An implementation may provide a mechanism to start agents sometime after the the VM has started. The details as to how this is initiated are implementation specific but typically the application has already started and its main method has already been invoked. In cases where an implementation supports the starting of agents after the VM has started the following applies:
trans-unit.target: 一个实现可以提供一种机制，可以在VM启动之后的某个时间启动代理。有关如何启动的详细信息是特定于实现的，但是通常应用程序已经启动，并且其 main 方法已经被调用。在虚拟机启动后实现支持启动代理的情况下，适用以下规则：

trans-unit.source: An implementation may require to examine the file to determine if the file is a directory. Consequently this method may not be atomic with respect to other file system operations. If the file is a symbolic link then the symbolic link itself, not the final target of the link, is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 实现可能需要检查文件以确定文件是否是一个目录。因此,这个方法与其他文件系统的操作相比,可能不是原子性的。如果文件是一个符号链接,那么删除的是符号链接本身,而不是链接的最终目标。

trans-unit.source: An implementation may support a mechanism to start agents some time after the VM has started. For example, an implementation may provide a mechanism that allows a tool to
trans-unit.target: 实施例可以支持在虚拟机启动后一段时间内启动代理的机制。例如,一个实施例可以提供一种机制,该机制允许工具

trans-unit.source: An implementation may support additional map modes.
trans-unit.target: 一个实施例可以支持额外的地图模式。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ExecutionControl which executes in the same JVM as the JShell-core.
trans-unit.target: ExecutionControl 的实现，该实现在与JShell-core相同的JVM中执行。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ReadWriteLock supporting similar semantics to ReentrantLock.
trans-unit.target: ReadWriteLock 的实现，支持与 ReentrantLock 相似的语义。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of DataSource must include a public no-arg constructor.
trans-unit.target: DataSource 的实现必须包括一个公共的无参数构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of FileFilter that filters using a specified set of extensions.
trans-unit.target: FileFilter 的实现，它使用一组指定的扩展名进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of FileFilter that filters using a specified set of extensions. The extension for a file is the portion of the file name after the last ".". Files whose name does not contain a "." have no file name extension. File name extension comparisons are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: FileFilter 的实现，它使用一组指定的扩展名进行过滤。文件的扩展名是文件名中最后一个“。”之后的部分。名称不包含“。”的文件 没有文件扩展名。文件扩展名比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageInputStream that gets its input from a File or RandomAccessFile.
trans-unit.target: ImageInputStream 的实现，该实现从 File 或 RandomAccessFile 获取输入。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageInputStream that gets its input from a File or RandomAccessFile. The file contents are assumed to be stable during the lifetime of the object.
trans-unit.target: ImageInputStream 的实现，该实现从 File 或 RandomAccessFile 获取输入。假定文件内容在对象的生存期内是稳定的。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageInputStream that gets its input from a regular InputStream.
trans-unit.target: 从常规 InputStream 获取其输入的 ImageInputStream 的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageInputStream that gets its input from a regular InputStream. A file is used to cache previously read data.
trans-unit.target: 从常规 InputStream 获取其输入的 ImageInputStream 的实现。文件用于缓存先前读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageInputStream that gets its input from a regular InputStream. A memory buffer is used to cache at least the data between the discard position and the current read position.
trans-unit.target: 从常规 InputStream 获取其输入的 ImageInputStream 的实现。存储器缓冲器用于至少在丢弃位置和当前读取位置之间缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageOutputStream that writes its output directly to a File or RandomAccessFile.
trans-unit.target: ImageOutputStream 的实现，将其输出直接写入 File 或 RandomAccessFile 。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageOutputStream that writes its output to a regular OutputStream.
trans-unit.target: ImageOutputStream 的实现，将其输出写入常规的 OutputStream 。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageOutputStream that writes its output to a regular OutputStream. A file is used to cache data until it is flushed to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: ImageOutputStream 的实现，将其输出写入常规的 OutputStream 。文件将用于缓存数据，直到将其刷新到输出流为止。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ImageOutputStream that writes its output to a regular OutputStream. A memory buffer is used to cache at least the data between the discard position and the current write position. The only constructor takes an OutputStream, so this class may not be used for read/modify/write operations. Reading can occur only on parts of the stream that have already been written to the cache and not yet flushed.
trans-unit.target: ImageOutputStream 的实现，将其输出写入常规的 OutputStream 。存储器缓冲器用于至少在丢弃位置和当前写入位置之间缓存数据。唯一的构造方法使用 OutputStream ，因此此类不能用于读取/修改/写入操作。只能在流中已被写入高速缓存但尚未刷新的部分上进行读取。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatterFactory.
trans-unit.target: JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatterFactory 的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatterFactory. DefaultFormatterFactory allows specifying a number of different JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatters that are to be used. The most important one is the default one (setDefaultFormatter). The default formatter will be used if a more specific formatter could not be found. The following process is used to determine the appropriate formatter to use.
trans-unit.target: JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatterFactory 的实现。 DefaultFormatterFactory 允许指定要使用的许多不同的 JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter 。最重要的是默认值之一（ setDefaultFormatter ）。如果找不到更特定的格式器，则将使用默认格式器。以下过程用于确定要使用的适当格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of LoggerFinder may override this method, for example, when the underlying logging backend provides its own mechanism for localizing log messages, then such a LoggerFinder would be free to return a logger that makes direct use of the mechanism provided by the backend.
trans-unit.target: LoggerFinder 的实现可以重写此方法，例如，当基础日志后端提供其自己的本地化日志消息的机制时，则这样的 LoggerFinder 可以自由返回直接使用后端提供的机制的记录器。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of PKIXRevocationChecker is responsible for adding the ignored exceptions to the list.
trans-unit.target: PKIXRevocationChecker 的实现负责将忽略的异常添加到列表中。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of RowSorter that provides sorting and filtering around a grid-based data model.
trans-unit.target: RowSorter 的实现，可围绕基于网格的数据模型进行排序和筛选。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of RowSorter that provides sorting and filtering around a grid-based data model. Beyond creating and installing a RowSorter, you very rarely need to interact with one directly. Refer to TableRowSorter for a concrete implementation of RowSorter for JTable.
trans-unit.target: RowSorter 的实现，可围绕基于网格的数据模型进行排序和筛选。除了创建和安装 RowSorter 之外，您很少需要直接与之交互。有关 JTable 的 RowSorter 的具体实现，请参考 TableRowSorter 。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of RowSorter that provides sorting and filtering using a TableModel.
trans-unit.target: RowSorter 的实现，使用 TableModel 提供排序和筛选。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of RowSorter that provides sorting and filtering using a TableModel. The following example shows adding sorting to a JTable:
trans-unit.target: RowSorter 的实现，使用 TableModel 提供排序和筛选。以下示例显示了对 JTable 添加排序：

trans-unit.source: An implementation of XADataSource must include a public no-arg constructor.
trans-unit.target: XADataSource 的实现必须包括一个公共的无参数构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of ElementChange that can be added to the document event.
trans-unit.target: ElementChange的实现,可以添加到文档事件中。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a "push" button.
trans-unit.target: 一个 "按钮 "的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a check box -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个复选框的实现--一个可以选择或取消选择的项目,并向用户显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a check box -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user. By convention, any number of check boxes in a group can be selected. See How to Use Buttons, Check Boxes, and Radio Buttons in The Java Tutorial for examples and information on using check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 复选框的实现-可以选择或取消选择的项目，并向用户显示其状态。按照惯例，可以选择组中任意数量的复选框。有关使用复选框的示例和信息，请参见Java教程中的如何使用按钮，复选框和单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a check box -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user. By convention, any number of check boxes in a group can be selected. See How to Use Buttons, Check Boxes, and Radio Buttons in The Java Tutorial for examples and information on using check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 复选框的实现-可以选择或取消选择的项目，并向用户显示其状态。按照惯例，可以选择组中任意数量的复选框。有关使用复选框的示例和信息，请参见Java教程中的如何使用按钮，复选框和单选按钮。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a lightweight component that participates in layout but has no view.
trans-unit.target: 一个参与布局但没有视图的轻量级组件的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a menu -- a popup window containing JMenuItems that is displayed when the user selects an item on the JMenuBar.
trans-unit.target: 菜单的实现-包含 JMenuItem 的弹出窗口，当用户在 JMenuBar 上选择一个项目时显示。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a menu -- a popup window containing JMenuItems that is displayed when the user selects an item on the JMenuBar. In addition to JMenuItems, a JMenu can also contain JSeparators.
trans-unit.target: 菜单的实现-包含 JMenuItem 的弹出窗口，当用户在 JMenuBar 上选择一个项目时显示。除了 JMenuItem 之外， JMenu 还可以包含 JSeparator 。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 菜单栏的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a menu bar. You add JMenu objects to the menu bar to construct a menu. When the user selects a JMenu object, its associated JPopupMenu is displayed, allowing the user to select one of the JMenuItems on it.
trans-unit.target: 菜单栏的实现。您将 JMenu 对象添加到菜单栏以构造菜单。当用户选择 JMenu 对象时，将显示其关联的 JPopupMenu ，从而允许用户选择其上的 JMenuItems 之一。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a popup menu -- a small window that pops up and displays a series of choices.
trans-unit.target: 一个弹出式菜单的实现--一个弹出并显示一系列选择的小窗口。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a popup menu -- a small window that pops up and displays a series of choices. A JPopupMenu is used for the menu that appears when the user selects an item on the menu bar. It is also used for "pull-right" menu that appears when the selects a menu item that activates it. Finally, a JPopupMenu can also be used anywhere else you want a menu to appear. For example, when the user right-clicks in a specified area.
trans-unit.target: 弹出菜单的实现-弹出并显示一系列选择的小窗口。甲 JPopupMenu 用于显示当用户选择一个菜单项的菜单栏上的菜单。它也用于在选择激活菜单的菜单项时出现的“向右”菜单。最后， JPopupMenu 也可以在您希望菜单出现的其他任何地方使用。例如，当用户右键单击指定区域时。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a radio button -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮的实现--一个可以选择或取消选择的项目,并向用户显示其状态。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a radio button -- an item that can be selected or deselected, and which displays its state to the user. Used with a ButtonGroup object to create a group of buttons in which only one button at a time can be selected. (Create a ButtonGroup object and use its add method to include the JRadioButton objects in the group.)
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮的实现-可以选择或取消选择的项目，并向用户显示其状态。与 ButtonGroup 对象一起使用以创建一组按钮，其中一次只能选择一个按钮。（创建一个ButtonGroup对象，并使用其 add 方法在该组中包括JRadioButton对象。）

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a radio button menu item.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮菜单项的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a radio button menu item. A JRadioButtonMenuItem is a menu item that is part of a group of menu items in which only one item in the group can be selected. The selected item displays its selected state. Selecting it causes any other selected item to switch to the unselected state. To control the selected state of a group of radio button menu items, use a ButtonGroup object.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮菜单项的实现。甲 JRadioButtonMenuItem 对象是是一组菜单项，其中只有一个组中的项目可以被选择的组成部分的菜单项。所选项目显示其所选状态。选择它会导致任何其他选定项目切换到未选定状态。若要控制一组单选按钮菜单项的选定状态，请使用 ButtonGroup 对象。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 一个滚动条的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a scrollbar. The user positions the knob in the scrollbar to determine the contents of the viewing area. The program typically adjusts the display so that the end of the scrollbar represents the end of the displayable contents, or 100% of the contents. The start of the scrollbar is the beginning of the displayable contents, or 0%. The position of the knob within those bounds then translates to the corresponding percentage of the displayable contents.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的一种实现方式。用户在滚动条中定位旋钮,以确定观看区域的内容。程序通常会调整显示,使滚动条的末端代表可显示内容的末端,或100%的内容。滚动条的开始是可显示内容的开始,或0%。旋钮在这些范围内的位置就转化为可显示内容的相应百分比。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a service provided by a module.
trans-unit.target: 一个模块提供的服务的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a two-state button.
trans-unit.target: 一个双状态按钮的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a two-state button. The JRadioButton and JCheckBox classes are subclasses of this class. For information on using them see How to Use Buttons, Check Boxes, and Radio Buttons, a section in The Java Tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 两种状态按钮的实现。在 JRadioButton 和 JCheckBox 的类是这一类的子类。有关使用它们的信息，请参见《 Java教程》中的“如何使用按钮，复选框和单选按钮”。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of a two-state button. The JRadioButton and JCheckBox classes are subclasses of this class. For information on using them see How to Use Buttons, Check Boxes, and Radio Buttons, a section in The Java Tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 两种状态按钮的实现。在 JRadioButton 和 JCheckBox 的类是这一类的子类。有关使用它们的信息，请参见《 Java教程》中的“如何使用按钮，复选框和单选按钮”。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of an item in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单中的一个项目的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of an item in a menu. A menu item is essentially a button sitting in a list. When the user selects the "button", the action associated with the menu item is performed. A JMenuItem contained in a JPopupMenu performs exactly that function.
trans-unit.target: 菜单中项目的实现。菜单项实质上是坐在列表中的按钮。当用户选择“按钮”时，执行与菜单项关联的动作。 JPopupMenu 中包含的 JMenuItem 完全执行该功能。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the ExecutionControl execution engine SPI which streams requests to a remote agent where execution takes place.
trans-unit.target: ExecutionControl 执行引擎SPI的实现，该请求将请求流传输到发生执行的远程代理。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the InvocationHandler interface for use with Java Remote Method Invocation (Java RMI).
trans-unit.target: 与Java远程方法调用（Java RMI）一起使用的 InvocationHandler 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the InvocationHandler interface for use with Java Remote Method Invocation (Java RMI). This invocation handler can be used in conjunction with a dynamic proxy instance as a replacement for a pregenerated stub class.
trans-unit.target: 与Java远程方法调用（Java RMI）一起使用的 InvocationHandler 接口的实现。该调用处理程序可以与动态代理实例结合使用，以替代预先生成的存根类。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the AbstractDocument.Content interface implemented using a gapped buffer similar to that used by emacs.
trans-unit.target: 一个AbstractDocument.Content接口的实现,使用一个类似于emacs使用的gapped缓冲区来实现。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the AbstractDocument.Content interface implemented using a gapped buffer similar to that used by emacs. The underlying storage is a array of unicode characters with a gap somewhere. The gap is moved to the location of changes to take advantage of common behavior where most changes are in the same location. Changes that occur at a gap boundary are generally cheap and moving the gap is generally cheaper than moving the array contents directly to accommodate the change.
trans-unit.target: AbstractDocument.Content接口的一个实现,使用类似于emacs使用的gapped缓冲区来实现。底层存储是一个带有间隙的unicode字符数组。空隙被移动到变化的位置,以利用大多数变化在同一位置的常见行为。发生在间隙边界的变化一般很便宜,移动间隙一般比直接移动数组内容来适应变化更便宜。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the AbstractDocument.Content interface that is a brute force implementation that is useful for relatively small documents and/or debugging.
trans-unit.target: 一个AbstractDocument.Content接口的实现,它是一个粗暴的实现,对于相对较小的文档和/或调试是有用的。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the AbstractDocument.Content interface that is a brute force implementation that is useful for relatively small documents and/or debugging. It manages the character content as a simple character array. It is also quite inefficient.
trans-unit.target: AbstractDocument.Content接口的一个实现,它是一个粗暴的实现,对于相对较小的文档和/或调试是有用的。它将字符内容作为一个简单的字符数组来管理。它的效率也很低。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the Icon interface that paints Icons from Images.
trans-unit.target: Icon接口的实现,可以从图像中绘制Icon。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the Icon interface that paints Icons from Images. Images that are created from a URL, filename or byte array are preloaded using MediaTracker to monitor the loaded state of the image.
trans-unit.target: Icon接口的一个实现,可以从图像中绘制Icons。从 URL、文件名或字节数组创建的图像会使用 MediaTracker 预加载,以监控图像的加载状态。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the document interface to serve as a basis for implementing various kinds of documents.
trans-unit.target: 文件接口的实现,作为实现各类文件的基础。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the document interface to serve as a basis for implementing various kinds of documents. At this level there is very little policy, so there is a corresponding increase in difficulty of use.
trans-unit.target: 文档接口的实现,作为实现各类文档的基础。在这个层面上,政策性的东西很少,所以使用难度也相应增加。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this interface may prohibit truncation when connected to an entity, typically a file, opened with the APPEND option.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到使用 APPEND 选项打开的实体（通常是文件）时，此接口的实现可能禁止截断。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this interface may support additional implementation specific options.
trans-unit.target: 该接口的实施可以支持额外的实施特定选项。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this interface must define a compareTo method that provides an ordering consistent with its getDelay method.
trans-unit.target: 此接口的实现必须定义一个 compareTo 方法，该方法提供与其 getDelay 方法一致的顺序。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this interface should be serializable and should implement Object.equals(java.lang.Object) to return true when passed an instance that represents the same (functionally equivalent) client socket factory, and false otherwise (and it should also implement Object.hashCode() consistently with its Object.equals implementation).
trans-unit.target: 此接口的实现应该是可序列化的，并且应该实现 Object.equals(java.lang.Object) 以在传递表示相同（功能等效）客户端套接字工厂的实例时返回 true ，否则返回 false （并且它还应该实现 Object.hashCode() 与其 Object.equals 实现保持一致）。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this interface should implement Object.equals(java.lang.Object) to return true when passed an instance that represents the same (functionally equivalent) server socket factory, and false otherwise (and it should also implement Object.hashCode() consistently with its Object.equals implementation).
trans-unit.target: 此接口的实现应实现 Object.equals(java.lang.Object) ,以在传递表示相同（功能等效）服务器套接字工厂的实例时返回 true ，否则返回 false （并且还应实现 Object.hashCode() 与其 Object.equals 实现保持一致）。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method may perform arbitrary lookahead by returning CoderResult.UNDERFLOW until it receives sufficient input.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现可以通过返回 CoderResult.UNDERFLOW 直到接收到足够的输入，来执行任意先行。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method might remove/destroy a Subject's Principals and Credentials.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的实现可能会删除/销毁一个主体的原则和证书。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must arrange for any other thread that is blocked in a selection operation upon this selector to return immediately as if by invoking the wakeup method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现必须安排在此选择器上进行选择操作时被阻塞的任何其他线程立即返回，就像通过调用 wakeup 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must arrange for any other thread that is blocked in a selection operation upon this selector to return immediately as if by invoking the wakeup method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现必须安排在此选择器上进行选择操作时被阻塞的任何其他线程立即返回，就像通过调用 wakeup 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must arrange for any other thread that is blocked in an I/O operation upon the channel to return immediately, either by throwing an exception or by returning normally. If the channel is registered with one or more Selectors then the file descriptor should not be released until the implReleaseChannel method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现必须安排在I / O操作中在通道上阻塞的任何其他线程立即通过抛出异常或通过正常返回而立即返回。如果通道 registered 一个或多个 Selector 注册，则在调用 implReleaseChannel 方法之前，不应释放文件描述符。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must arrange for any other thread that is blocked in an I/O operation upon this channel to return immediately, either by throwing an exception or by returning normally.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的实现必须安排任何其他线程在这个通道上的I/O操作中被阻塞的线程立即返回,要么抛出异常,要么正常返回。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must either return a class with the given name or throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的实现必须返回一个给定名称的类,或者抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this method must either return a proxy class that implements the named interfaces or throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的实现必须返回一个实现指定接口的代理类,或者抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: An implementation should attempt to comply with the maximum packet size configuration. However, if the maximum packet size is too small to hold a minimal record, an implementation may try to generate as minimal records as possible. This may cause a generated packet to be larger than the maximum packet size.

trans-unit.source: An important method that must be implemented by each subclass is the implies method to compare Permissions. Basically, "permission p1 implies permission p2" means that if one is granted permission p1, one is naturally granted permission p2. Thus, this is not an equality test, but rather more of a subset test.
trans-unit.target: 每个子类必须实现的一个重要方法是 implies 方法来比较权限。基本上，“权限p1意味着权限p2”是指，如果授予了权限p1，则自然是授予了权限p2。因此，这不是一个相等性测试，而是更多的子集测试。

trans-unit.source: An important method to define is the getPropertyPrefix() method which is used as the basis of the keys used to fetch defaults from the UIManager. The string should reflect the type of TextUI (eg. TextField, TextArea, etc) without the particular LAF part of the name (eg Metal, Motif, etc).
trans-unit.target: 定义的一个重要方法是 getPropertyPrefix() 方法，该方法用作从UIManager获取默认值的键的基础。该字符串应反映TextUI的类型（例如TextField，TextArea等），而名称中不包含LAF部分（例如Metal，Motif等）。

trans-unit.source: An important property of the directory stream's Iterator is that its hasNext method is guaranteed to read-ahead by at least one element. If hasNext method returns true, and is followed by a call to the next method, it is guaranteed that the next method will not throw an exception due to an I/O error, or because the stream has been closed. The Iterator does not support the remove operation.
trans-unit.target: 目录流的 Iterator 的一个重要属性是，保证其 hasNext 方法至少可以预读一个元素。如果 hasNext 方法返回 true ，并随后调用 next 方法，则可以确保 next 方法不会由于I / O错误或流已 closed 而引发异常。该 Iterator 不支持 remove 操作。

The Iterator does not support the remove operation.

trans-unit.source: An independently generated UID instance is unique over time with respect to the host it is generated on as long as the host requires more than one millisecond to reboot and its system clock is never set backward. trans-unit.target: 只要主机需要超过一毫秒的时间来重新启动并且其系统时钟永不向后设置，一个独立生成的 UID 实例就相对于其生成的主机而言在时间上是唯一的。可以通过将 UID 实例与唯一的主机标识符（例如IP地址）配对来构造全局唯一的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An instance of J is reconstructed by calling a constructor with the appropriate reconstructed items from the CompositeData. The constructor to be called will be determined at runtime based on the items actually present in the CompositeData, given that this CompositeData might come from an earlier version of J where not all the items were present. A constructor is applicable if all the properties named in its @ConstructorParameters or @ConstructorProperties annotation are present as items in the CompositeData. If no constructor is applicable, then the attempt to reconstruct J fails.
trans-unit.target: 通过从 CompositeData 调用带有适当的重构项的构造函数来重构J的实例。假设此 CompositeData 可能来自J的早期版本，而并非所有项目都存在，则将在运行时根据 CompositeData 中实际存在的项目确定要调用的构造函数。构造函数是适用的，如果所有在其指定的性能 @ConstructorParameters 或 @ConstructorProperties 注释是存在于项目 CompositeData 。如果没有适用的构造函数，则尝试重建J 失败。

A constructor is applicable if all the properties named in its ConstructorProperties annotation are present as items in the CompositeData. If no constructor is applicable, then the attempt to reconstruct J fails.
trans-unit.target: 通过从 CompositeData 调用带有适当的重构项的构造函数来重构J的实例。假定此 CompositeData 可能来自J的早期版本，而并非所有项都存在，则将在运行时根据 CompositeData 中实际存在的项确定要调用的构造函数。如果在其 ConstructorProperties 批注中命名的所有属性都在 CompositeData 中作为项目出现，则构造器适用。如果没有适用的构造函数，则重建J的尝试将失败。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the URL class, by contrast, represents the syntactic components of a URL together with some of the information required to access the resource that it describes. A URL must be absolute, that is, it must always specify a scheme. A URL string is parsed according to its scheme. A stream handler is always established for a URL, and in fact it is impossible to create a URL instance for a scheme for which no handler is available. Equality and hashing depend upon both the scheme and the Internet address of the host, if any; comparison is not defined. In other words, a URL is a structured string that supports the syntactic operation of resolution as well as the network I/O operations of looking up the host and opening a connection to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下， URL 类的实例代表URL的语法组件以及访问其描述的资源所需的一些信息。 URL必须是绝对的，也就是说，它必须始终指定一个方案。 URL字符串将根据其方案进行解析。始终为URL建立流处理程序，实际上，不可能为没有可用处理程序的方案创建URL实例。平等和哈希取决于方案和主机的Internet地址（如果有）；未定义比较。换句话说，URL是一种结构化的字符串，它支持解析的语法操作以及查找主机并打开与指定资源的连接的网络I / O操作。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the Spring class can be visualized as a mechanical spring that provides a corrective force as the spring is compressed or stretched away from its preferred value. This force is modelled as linear function of the distance from the preferred value, but with two different constants -- one for the compressional force and one for the tensional one. Those constants are specified by the minimum and maximum values of the spring such that a spring at its minimum value produces an equal and opposite force to that which is created when it is at its maximum value. The difference between the preferred and minimum values, therefore, represents the ease with which the spring can be compressed and the difference between its maximum and preferred values, indicates the ease with which the Spring can be extended. See the sum(javax.swing.Spring, javax.swing.Spring) method for details.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 Spring 类的一个实例可视化为机械弹簧，该机械弹簧在压缩或拉伸远离其首选值时会提供校正力。该力被建模为距最佳值的距离的线性函数，但具有两个不同的常数-一个用于压缩力，一个用于拉伸力。这些常数由弹簧的最小值和最大值指定，这样，处于最小值的弹簧会产生与处于最大值时所产生的力相等且相反的力。因此，优选值与最小值之间的差异表示弹簧可压缩的难易程度以及其最大值之间的差异。和首选值表示可以轻松扩展 Spring 。有关详细信息 sum(javax.swing.Spring, javax.swing.Spring) 请参见sum（javax.swing.Spring，javax.swing.Spring）方法。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class represents a URI reference in the syntactic sense defined by RFC 2396. A URI may be either absolute or relative. A URI string is parsed according to the generic syntax without regard to the scheme, if any, that it specifies. No lookup of the host, if any, is performed, and no scheme-dependent stream handler is constructed. Equality, hashing, and comparison are defined strictly in terms of the character content of the instance. In other words, a URI instance is little more than a structured string that supports the syntactic, scheme-independent operations of comparison, normalization, resolution, and relativization.
trans-unit.target: 该类的一个实例代表RFC 2396所定义的语法意义上的URI引用。一个URI可以是绝对的或相对的。URI字符串根据通用语法进行解析,而不考虑它所指定的方案(如果有的话)。不执行主机的查找(如果有的话),也不构建依赖于方案的流处理程序。等价、散列和比较是严格按照实例的字符内容来定义的。换句话说,URI实例只不过是一个结构化的字符串,它支持比较、归一化、解析和相对化这些与语法、方案无关的操作。

trans-unit.source: An instrument is a sound-synthesis algorithm with certain parameter settings, usually designed to emulate a specific real-world musical instrument or to achieve a specific sort of sound effect.

trans-unit.source: An instrument is a sound-synthesis algorithm with certain parameter settings, usually designed to emulate a specific real-world musical instrument or to achieve a specific sort of sound effect. Instruments are typically stored in collections called soundbanks. Before the instrument can be used to play notes, it must first be loaded onto a synthesizer, and then it must be selected for use on one or more channels, via a program-change command. MIDI notes that are subsequently received on those channels will be played using the sound of the selected instrument.
trans-unit.target: 乐器是一种具有一定参数设置的声音合成算法,通常是为了模拟特定的现实世界中的乐器或达到特定的声音效果。乐器通常存储在称为声库的集合中。在使用乐器演奏音符之前,必须先将其加载到合成器上,然后通过程序更改命令将其选择在一个或多个通道上使用。随后在这些通道上接收到的MIDI音符将用所选乐器的声音来演奏。

Other methods may also accept or return this value, as documented.

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve private key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA).
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线私钥的接口，如RFC 8032：Edwards-Curve数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve private key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA). These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECPrivateKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 8032 such as the EdDSA Signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线私钥的接口，如RFC 8032：Edwards-Curve数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。这些密钥与 ECPrivateKey 表示的密钥不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 8032的算法（例如EdDSA Signature 算法）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve private key as defined by RFC 7748.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748定义的椭圆曲线私钥的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve private key as defined by RFC 7748. These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECPrivateKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 7748 such as the XDH KeyAgreement algorithm. An XEC private key is an encoded scalar value as described in RFC 7748. The decoding procedure defined in this RFC includes an operation that forces certain bits of the key to either 1 or 0. This operation is known as "pruning" or "clamping" the private key. Arrays returned by this interface are unpruned, and implementations will need to prune the array before using it in any numerical operations.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748定义的椭圆曲线专用密钥的接口。这些密钥与 ECPrivateKey 表示的密钥不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 7748的算法（例如XDH KeyAgreement 算法）一起使用。 XEC专用密钥是RFC 7748中描述的编码标量值。此RFC中定义的解码过程包括将密钥的某些位强制为1或0的操作。此操作称为“修剪”或“钳位”私钥。此接口返回的数组是未修剪的，实现将需要修剪该数组，然后才能在任何数值运算中使用它。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA).
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线公钥的接口，如RFC 8032：爱德华兹曲线数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA). These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECPublicKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 8032 such as the EdDSA Signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线公钥的接口，如RFC 8032：爱德华兹曲线数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。这些密钥与 ECPublicKey 表示的密钥不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 8032的算法（例如EdDSA Signature 算法）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public key as defined by RFC 7748.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748所定义的椭圆曲线公钥的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public key as defined by RFC 7748. These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECPublicKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 7748 such as the XDH KeyAgreement algorithm. An XEC public key is a particular point on the curve, which is represented using only its u-coordinate as described in RFC 7748. A u-coordinate is an element of the field of integers modulo some value that is determined by the algorithm parameters. This field element is represented by a BigInteger which may hold any value. That is, the BigInteger is not restricted to the range of canonical field elements.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748定义的椭圆曲线公共密钥的接口。这些密钥与 ECPublicKey 表示的密钥不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 7748的算法（例如XDH KeyAgreement 算法）一起使用。 XEC公钥是曲线上的特定点，如RFC 7748中所述，仅使用其u坐标表示。u坐标是整数字段的元素，该元素对由算法参数确定的某些值取模。此字段元素由BigInteger表示，可以保存任何值。也就是说，BigInteger不限于规范字段元素的范围。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public/private key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA).
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线公钥/私钥的接口，如RFC 8032：爱德华兹曲线数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public/private key as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA). These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 8032 such as the EdDSA Signature algorithm. This interface allows access to the algorithm parameters associated with the key.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆曲线公钥/私钥的接口，如RFC 8032：爱德华兹曲线数字签名算法（EdDSA）所定义。这些密钥不同于 ECKey 表示的密钥，它们旨在与基于RFC 8032的算法（例如EdDSA Signature 算法）一起使用。该接口允许访问与密钥关联的算法参数。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public/private key as defined by RFC 7748.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748定义的椭圆曲线公钥/私钥的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for an elliptic curve public/private key as defined by RFC 7748. These keys are distinct from the keys represented by ECKey, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 7748 such as the XDH KeyAgreement algorithm. This interface allows access to the algorithm parameters associated with the key.
trans-unit.target: RFC 7748定义的椭圆曲线公用/专用密钥的接口。这些密钥与 ECKey 表示的密钥不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 7748的算法（例如XDH KeyAgreement 算法）一起使用。该接口允许访问与密钥关联的算法参数。

trans-unit.target: 用于创建 SaslClient 实例的接口。实现此接口的类必须是线程安全的，并且可以同时处理多个请求。它还必须具有不接受任何参数的公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An interface for creating instances of SaslServer.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 SaslServer 实例的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for creating instances of SaslServer. A class that implements this interface must be thread-safe and handle multiple simultaneous requests. It must also have a public constructor that accepts no argument.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 SaslServer 实例的接口。实现此接口的类必须是线程安全的，并且可以同时处理多个请求。它还必须具有不接受任何参数的公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An interface for events that know how to dispatch themselves.
trans-unit.target: 一个知道如何调度自己的事件的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for events that know how to dispatch themselves. By implementing this interface an event can be placed upon the event queue and its dispatch() method will be called when the event is dispatched, using the EventDispatchThread.
trans-unit.target: 知道如何调度自己的事件的接口。通过实现此接口，可以将事件放置在事件队列上，并在使用 EventDispatchThread 调度事件时调用其 dispatch() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An interface for handling Entity Declarations This interface is used to record and report unparsed entity declarations.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理实体声明的接口 该接口用于记录和报告未解析的实体声明。

trans-unit.source: An interface for handling Entity events.
trans-unit.target: 一个处理实体事件的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for handling Entity events. This event reports entities that have not been resolved and reports their replacement text unprocessed (if available). This event will be reported if javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences is set to false. If javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences is set to true entity references will be resolved transparently. Entities are handled in two possible ways: (1) If javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences is set to true all entity references are resolved and reported as markup transparently. (2) If javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences is set to false Entity references are reported as an EntityReference Event.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理实体事件的接口。该事件报告尚未解析的实体,并报告其未处理的替换文本(如果可用)。如果javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences被设置为false,该事件将被报告。如果 javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences 被设置为 true,实体引用将被透明地解析。实体的处理方式有两种可能。(1)如果javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences被设置为true,所有的实体引用都会被解析并透明地报告为标记。(2)如果javax.xml.stream.isReplacingEntityReferences被设置为false,实体引用将被报告为EntityReference事件。

trans-unit.source: An interface for handling Notation Declarations Receive notification of a notation declaration event.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理记号声明的接口 接收记号声明事件的通知。

trans-unit.source: An interface for handling Notation Declarations Receive notification of a notation declaration event. It is up to the application to record the notation for later reference, At least one of publicId and systemId must be non-null. There is no guarantee that the notation declaration will be reported before any unparsed entities that use it.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理记号声明的接口 接收记号声明事件的通知。由应用程序决定是否记录该记号供以后参考,publicId和systemId中至少有一个必须是非空的。不能保证符号声明会在任何使用它的未解析实体之前被报告。

trans-unit.source: An interface for objects that wish to be informed when tiles of a WritableRenderedImage become modifiable by some writer via a call to getWritableTile, and when they become unmodifiable via the last call to releaseWritableTile.
trans-unit.target: 当WritableRenderedImage的磁贴通过调用getWritableTile变得可以被某个作者修改时,以及当它们通过最后一次调用releaseWritableTile变得不可修改时,希望被通知的对象的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for service providers that provide implementations of ResourceBundle.Control.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供商的接口，提供 ResourceBundle.Control 的实现。

trans-unit.source: An interface for service providers that provide implementations of ResourceBundle.Control. The default resource bundle loading behavior of the ResourceBundle.getBundle factory methods that take no ResourceBundle.Control instance can be modified with ResourceBundleControlProvider implementations.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供商的接口，提供 ResourceBundle.Control 的实现。不使用 ResourceBundle.Control 实例的 ResourceBundle.getBundle 工厂方法的默认资源束加载行为可以通过 ResourceBundleControlProvider 实现进行修改。

trans-unit.source: An interface for service providers that provide implementations of ResourceBundle.Control. The default resource bundle loading behavior of the ResourceBundle.getBundle factory methods that take no ResourceBundle.Control instance can be modified with ResourceBundleControlProvider implementations.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供商的接口，提供 ResourceBundle.Control 的实现。不带 ResourceBundle.Control 实例的 ResourceBundle.getBundle 工厂方法的默认资源束加载行为可以通过 ResourceBundleControlProvider 实现进行修改。

trans-unit.source: An interface for service providers that provide implementations of ResourceBundle.Control.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供商的接口，提供 ResourceBundle.Control 的实现。

trans-unit.source: An interface for the end element event.
trans-unit.target: 结束元素事件的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface for the end element event. An EndElement is reported for each End Tag in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个结束元素事件的接口。为文档中的每个End Tag报告一个EndElement。

trans-unit.source: An interface for the start document event
trans-unit.target: 启动文件事件的接口

trans-unit.source: An interface method invocation on a proxy instance will be encoded and dispatched to the invocation handler's invoke method as described in the documentation for that method.
trans-unit.target: 代理实例上的接口方法调用将被编码并分派到调用处理程序的 invoke 方法，如该方法的文档中所述。

trans-unit.source: An interface method invocation on a proxy instance will be encoded and dispatched to the invocation handler's invoke method as described in the documentation for that method.
trans-unit.target: 代理实例上的接口方法调用将被编码并分派到调用处理程序的 invoke 方法，如该方法的文档中所述。

trans-unit.source: An interface not described by a more specific kind (like ANNOTATION_TYPE).
trans-unit.target: 没有用更具体的类型描述的接口（例如 ANNOTATION_TYPE ）。

trans-unit.source: An interface providing metadata transcoding capability.
trans-unit.target: 提供元数据转码能力的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface representing a data checksum.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示数据校验的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that can be used to allow MutableAttributeSet implementations to use pluggable attribute compression techniques.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于允许MutableAttributeSet实现使用可插拔属性压缩技术的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that can be used to allow MutableAttributeSet implementations to use pluggable attribute compression techniques. Each mutation of the attribute set can be used to exchange a previous AttributeSet instance with another, preserving the possibility of the AttributeSet remaining immutable. An implementation is provided by the StyleContext class. The Element implementations provided by this class use this interface to provide their MutableAttributeSet implementations, so that different AttributeSet compression techniques can be employed. The method getAttributeContext should be implemented to return the object responsible for implementing the desired compression technique.
trans-unit.target: 可用于允许MutableAttributeSet实现使用可插拔属性压缩技术的接口。属性集的每个变异都可用于与另一个属性集交换先前的AttributeSet实例，从而保留了AttributeSet保持不变的可能性。 StyleContext类提供了一个实现。此类提供的Element实现使用此接口提供其MutableAttributeSet实现，以便可以采用不同的AttributeSet压缩技术。应该实现方法 getAttributeContext 以返回负责实现所需压缩技术的对象。

trans-unit.source: An interface that contains information about a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含命名空间信息的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that contains information about a namespace. Namespaces are accessed from a StartElement.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含命名空间信息的接口。命名空间可以从StartElement访问。

trans-unit.source: An interface that contains information about an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含属性信息的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that contains information about an attribute. Attributes are reported as a set of events accessible from a StartElement. Other applications may report Attributes as first-order events, for example as the results of an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含属性信息的接口。属性被报告为一组可从StartElement访问的事件。其他应用程序可能会将属性报告为一阶事件,例如作为XPath表达式的结果。

trans-unit.source: An interface that defines the implementation of a factory that is used to obtain different types of RowSet implementations.
trans-unit.target: 定义工厂实现的接口，该工厂用于获取不同类型的 RowSet 实现。

trans-unit.source: An interface that describes the data found in processing instructions
trans-unit.target: 描述处理指令中的数据的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that is implemented by objects that decide if a directory entry should be accepted or filtered.
trans-unit.target: 一个由对象实现的接口,它决定一个目录条目是否应该被接受或过滤。

trans-unit.source: An interface that is implemented by objects that decide if a directory entry should be accepted or filtered. A Filter is passed as the parameter to the Files.newDirectoryStream(Path,DirectoryStream.Filter) method when opening a directory to iterate over the entries in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 由决定是否应接受或过滤目录条目的对象实现的接口。打开目录以迭代目录中的条目时 Files.newDirectoryStream(Path,DirectoryStream.Filter) 将 Filter 作为参数传递给Files.newDirectoryStream（Path，DirectoryStream.Filter）方法。

trans-unit.source: An interface that is implemented by objects that decide if a directory entry should be accepted or filtered. A Filter is passed as the parameter to the Files.newDirectoryStream(Path,DirectoryStream.Filter) method when opening a directory to iterate over the entries in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个由对象实现的接口，这些对象决定是否应接受或过滤目录条目。打开目录以遍历目录中的条目时 Files.newDirectoryStream(Path,DirectoryStream.Filter) 将 Filter 作为参数传递给Files.newDirectoryStream（Path，DirectoryStream.Filter）方法。

trans-unit.source: An interface that is implemented by objects that perform match operations on paths.
trans-unit.target: 一个由对路径进行匹配操作的对象实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that must be implemented by a component that wants to be notified when a significant event happens in the life of a RowSet object.
trans-unit.target: 一个接口，必须由要在 RowSet 对象的生命周期中发生重大事件时通知的组件实现。

trans-unit.source: An interface that must be implemented by a component that wants to be notified when a significant event happens in the life of a RowSet object. A component becomes a listener by being registered with a RowSet object via the method RowSet.addRowSetListener. How a registered component implements this interface determines what it does when it is notified of an event.
trans-unit.target: 一个接口，必须由要在 RowSet 对象的生命周期中发生重大事件时通知的组件实现。通过使用 RowSet.addRowSetListener 方法向 RowSet 对象注册组件，该组件将成为侦听器。已注册的组件如何实现此接口，确定在收到事件通知后它将如何处理。

trans-unit.source: An interface that must be implemented when a Driver wants to be notified by DriverManager.
trans-unit.target: 当要通过 DriverManager 通知驱动程序时必须实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that provides information to a scrolling container like JScrollPane.
trans-unit.target: 一个为像JScrollPane这样的滚动容器提供信息的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface that provides information to a scrolling container like JScrollPane. A complex component that's likely to be used as a viewing a JScrollPane viewport (or other scrolling container) should implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个为像JScrollPane这样的滚动容器提供信息的接口,一个可能被用来查看JScrollPane视口(或其他滚动容器)的复杂组件应该实现这个接口。一个可能被用来查看JScrollPane视口(或其他滚动容器)的复杂组件应该实现这个接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface to an object capable of generating DSA key pairs.
trans-unit.target: 一个能够生成DSA密钥对的对象的接口。

trans-unit.source: An interface to an object that is able to build, or augment, a DOM tree from various input sources.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象的接口,它能够从各种输入源建立或增强DOM树。

trans-unit.source: An interface to be implemented by objects that can determine the settings of an IIOMetadata object, either by putting up a GUI to obtain values from a user, or by other means.
trans-unit.target: 由可以确定 IIOMetadata 对象设置的对象实现的接口，方法是通过放置GUI来从用户那里获取值，或者通过其他方式。

trans-unit.source: An interface to be implemented by objects that can determine the settings of an IIOMetadata object, either by putting up a GUI to obtain values from a user, or by other means. This interface merely specifies a generic activate method that invokes the controller, without regard for how the controller obtains values (
trans-unit.target: 由可以确定 IIOMetadata 对象设置的对象实现的接口，方法是通过放置GUI来从用户那里获取值，或者通过其他方式。该接口仅指定调用控制器的通用 activate 方法，而不考虑控制器如何获取值（

trans-unit.source: An interface to be implemented by objects that can determine the settings of an IIOParam object, either by putting up a GUI to obtain values from a user, or by other means.
trans-unit.target: 由可以确定 IIOParam 对象设置的对象实现的接口，方法是放置GUI来从用户那里获取值，或者通过其他方式。

trans-unit.source: An interface to be implemented by objects that can determine the settings of an IIOParam object, either by putting up a GUI to obtain values from a user, or by other means. This interface merely specifies a generic activate method that invokes the controller, without regard for how the controller obtains values (
trans-unit.target: 由可以确定 IIOParam 对象设置的对象实现的接口，方法是放置GUI来从用户那里获取值，或者通过其他方式。该接口仅指定调用控制器的通用 activate 方法，而不考虑控制器如何获取值（

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageReader implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of pixel updates.
trans-unit.target: ImageReader 实现所使用的接口，用于将图像更新和缩略图读取方法通知调用者像素更新。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageReader implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of progress.
trans-unit.target: ImageReader 实现使用的接口，用于通知调用者其图像和缩略图读取方法的进度。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageReader implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of warnings (non-fatal errors).
trans-unit.target: ImageReader 实现使用的接口，用于将警告（非致命错误）通知给其图像和缩略图读取方法的调用方。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageReader implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of warnings (non-fatal errors). Fatal errors cause the relevant read method to throw an IIOException.
trans-unit.target: ImageReader 实现使用的接口，用于将警告（非致命错误）通知给其图像和缩略图读取方法的调用方。致命错误导致相关的读取方法抛出 IIOException 。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageWriter implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of warnings (non-fatal errors).
trans-unit.target: ImageWriter 实现使用的接口，用于向调用者通知其图像和缩略图读取方法警告（非致命错误）。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageWriter implementations to notify callers of their image and thumbnail reading methods of warnings (non-fatal errors). Fatal errors cause the relevant read method to throw an IIOException.
trans-unit.target: ImageWriter 实现使用的接口，用于向调用者通知其图像和缩略图读取方法警告（非致命错误）。致命错误导致相关的读取方法抛出 IIOException 。

trans-unit.source: An interface used by ImageWriter implementations to notify callers of their image writing methods of progress.
trans-unit.target: ImageWriter 实现使用的接口，用于通知调用者其图像写入方法的进度。

trans-unit.source: An intermediate weight between WEIGHT_LIGHT and WEIGHT_STANDARD.
trans-unit.target: 介于 WEIGHT_LIGHT 和 WEIGHT_STANDARD 之间的中间权重。

trans-unit.source: An intermediate weight between WEIGHT_REGULAR and WEIGHT_BOLD.
trans-unit.target: 介于 WEIGHT_REGULAR 和 WEIGHT_BOLD 之间的中间权重。

trans-unit.source: An internal problem has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生了内部问题。

trans-unit.source: An interpreter for printf-style format strings.
trans-unit.target: 打印格式字符串的解释器。

trans-unit.source: An interpreter for printf-style format strings. This class provides support for layout justification and alignment, common formats for numeric, string, and date/time data, and locale-specific output. Common Java types such as byte, BigDecimal, and Calendar are supported. Limited formatting customization for arbitrary user types is provided through the Formattable interface.
trans-unit.target: printf样式的格式字符串的解释器。此类提供对布局调整和对齐，数字，字符串和日期/时间数据的通用格式以及特定于语言环境的输出的支持。支持常见的Java类型，例如 byte ， BigDecimal 和 Calendar 。通过 Formattable 接口提供了针对任意用户类型的有限格式定制。

trans-unit.source: An interpreter resource is unavailable (e.g., font, form).
trans-unit.target: 解释器资源不可用(如字体、表格)。

trans-unit.source: An intersection type can be either implicitly or explicitly declared in a program. For example, the bound of the type parameter <T extends Number & Runnable> is an (implicit) intersection type. As of RELEASE_8, this is represented by an IntersectionType with Number and Runnable as its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 交集类型可以在程序中隐式或显式声明。例如，类型参数 <T extends Number & Runnable> 的边界是（隐式）交集类型。从 RELEASE_8 开始，它由一个以 Number 和 Runnable 为边界的 IntersectionType 表示。

trans-unit.source: An intersection type can be either implicitly or explicitly declared in a program. For example, the bound of the type parameter <T extends Number & Runnable> is an (implicit) intersection type. This is represented by an IntersectionType with Number and Runnable as its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 交集类型可以在程序中隐式或显式声明。例如，类型参数 <T extends Number & Runnable> 的边界是（隐式）交集类型。这由一个以 Number 和 Runnable 为边界的 IntersectionType 表示。

trans-unit.source: An intersection type.
trans-unit.target: 一个交集类型。

trans-unit.source: An invalid FilePermission does not imply any object except for itself. An invalid FilePermission is not implied by any object except for itself or a FilePermission on "<<ALL FILES>>" whose actions is a superset of this invalid FilePermission. Even if two FilePermission are created with the same invalid path, one does not imply the other.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 FilePermission 并不意味着除其本身以外的任何对象。除对象本身或“ << ALL FILES >>”上的 FilePermission 以外，任何对象都没有暗示无效的 FilePermission ,其动作是该无效 FilePermission 的超集。即使使用相同的无效路径创建了两个 FilePermission ，一个也不暗示另一个。

trans-unit.source: An invocation of the Recording.close() method will release the data and transition the recording to the CLOSED state.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Recording.close() 方法将释放数据并将记录转换为 CLOSED 状态。

trans-unit.source: An invocation of the Recording.start() method will transition the recording to the RUNNING state.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Recording.start() 方法会将记录转换为 RUNNING 状态。

trans-unit.source: An invocation of the hashCode, equals, or toString methods declared in java.lang.Object on a proxy instance will be encoded and dispatched to the invocation handler's invoke method in the same manner as interface method invocations are encoded and dispatched, as described above. The declaring class of the Method object passed to invoke will be java.lang.Object. Other public methods of a proxy instance inherited from java.lang.Object are not overridden by a proxy class, so invocations of those methods behave like they do for instances of java.lang.Object.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，将对代理实例上 java.lang.Object 中声明的 hashCode ， equals 或 toString 方法的调用进行编码，然后将其分配给调用处理程序的 invoke 方法，就像对接口方法的调用进行编码和分配一样。传递给 invoke 的 Method 对象的声明类将是 java.lang.Object 。从 java.lang.Object 继承的代理实例的其他公共方法不会被代理类覆盖，因此对这些方法的调用的行为就像对 java.lang.Object 实例的调用一样。

trans-unit.source: An invocation of the form InvocationEvent(source, runnable, notifier, catchThrowables) behaves in exactly the same way as the invocation of InvocationEvent(source, InvocationEvent.INVOCATION_DEFAULT, runnable, notifier, catchThrowables).

trans-unit.source: An object can be registered to listen to multiple lines. trans-unit.source: An object describing the structure of metadata documents returned from IIOMetadata.getAsTree and passed to IIOMetadata.setFromTree and mergeTree. Document structures are described by a set of constraints on the type and number of child elements that may belong to a given parent element type, the names, types, and values of attributes that may belong to an element, and the type and values of Object reference that may be stored at a node.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，描述从 IIOMetadata.getAsTree 返回并传递给 IIOMetadata.setFromTree 和 mergeTree 的元数据文档的结构。通过对可能属于给定父元素类型的子元素的类型和数量，可能属于某个元素的属性的名称，类型和值以及 Object 的类型和值的一组约束来描述文档结构可以存储在节点上的引用。

trans-unit.source: An object factory must implement the ObjectFactory interface. In addition, the factory class must be public and must have a public constructor that accepts no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 对象工厂必须实现 ObjectFactory 接口。此外，工厂类必须是公共的，并且必须具有不接受任何参数的公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An object factory must implement the ObjectFactory interface. In addition, the factory class must be public and must have a public constructor that accepts no parameters. Note that in cases where the factory is in a named module then it must be in a package which is exported by that module to the java.naming module.
trans-unit.target: 对象工厂必须实现 ObjectFactory 接口。此外，工厂类必须是公共的，并且必须具有不接受任何参数的公共构造函数。请注意，如果工厂位于命名模块中，则工厂必须位于该模块导出到 java.naming 模块的程序包中。

trans-unit.source: An object for traversing and partitioning elements of a source.
trans-unit.target: 用于遍历和分割源元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object for traversing and partitioning elements of a source. The source of elements covered by a Spliterator could be, for example, an array, a Collection, an IO channel, or a generator function.
trans-unit.target: 用于遍历和划分源元素的对象。分隔符覆盖的元素的来源可以是例如数组， Collection ，IO通道或生成器函数。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing this interface might not have an address at a given moment. This is indicated by a null return value from getAddress().
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的对象在给定时刻可能没有地址。这由 getAddress() 的空返回值指示。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing this interface might not have an address at a given moment. This is indicated by a null return value from getAddress().
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的对象在给定时刻可能没有地址。这由 getAddress() 的空返回值指示。

trans-unit.source: An object is phantom reachable if it is neither strongly, softly, nor weakly reachable, it has been finalized, and some phantom reference refers to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象既不是强的，软的也不是弱的，并且已被终结，并且有一些幻像引用对其进行了引用，则它是幻像可到达的。

trans-unit.source: An object is softly reachable if it is not strongly reachable but can be reached by traversing a soft reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象是软可到达，如果它不是强可到达，但通过遍历软引用可以到达。

trans-unit.source: An object is strongly reachable if it can be reached by some thread without traversing any reference objects. A newly-created object is strongly reachable by the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个对象可以在不遍历任何引用对象的情况下到达该对象，则该对象是高度可到达的。新创建的对象可由创建该对象的线程强烈访问。

trans-unit.source: An object is weakly reachable if it is neither strongly nor softly reachable but can be reached by traversing a weak reference. When the weak references to a weakly-reachable object are cleared, the object becomes eligible for finalization.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象既不是强可达也不是软可达，而是可以通过遍历弱引用来实现的，则它是弱可达的。清除对弱可访问对象的弱引用后，该对象将有资格进行终结处理。

trans-unit.source: An object name
trans-unit.target: 对象名称

trans-unit.source: An object name consists of two parts, the domain and the key properties.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象名由域和键属性两部分组成。

trans-unit.source: An object name is a pattern if its domain contains a wildcard or if the object name is a property pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象名的域包含通配符,或者对象名是属性模式,那么对象名就是一个模式。

trans-unit.source: An object name is a pattern on the key properties if it is a pattern on the key property list (e.g. "d:k=v,*") or on the property values (e.g. "d:k=*") or on both (e.g. "d:k=*,*").
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象名称是关键属性上的模式,那么它就是关键属性列表上的模式(如 "d:k=v,*")或属性值上的模式(如 "d:k=*")或两者都是(如 "d:k=*,*")。

trans-unit.source: An object of this class implements the MBeanServer interface and wraps another object that also implements that interface.

trans-unit.source: An object of this class implements the MBeanServer interface and wraps another object that also implements that interface. Typically, an implementation of this interface performs some action in some or all methods of the MBeanServer interface before and/or after forwarding the method to the wrapped object. Examples include security checking and logging.
trans-unit.target: 此类的对象实现MBeanServer接口，并包装另一个也实现该接口的对象。通常，在将方法转发到包装的对象之前和/或之后，此接口的实现会在 MBeanServer 接口的某些或所有方法中执行某些操作。示例包括安全检查和日志记录。

trans-unit.source: An object of this class may not be used in multiple threads running concurrently. Different Transformers may be used concurrently by different threads.
trans-unit.target: 该类的一个对象不可以在多个线程并发运行的情况下使用。不同的变形金刚可以被不同的线程并发使用。

trans-unit.source: An object of this interface is not required to support multi-threaded access, that is, be synchronized. However, it must support concurrent access to different file objects created by this object.
trans-unit.target: 这个接口的对象不需要支持多线程访问,也就是同步。但是,它必须支持对该对象创建的不同文件对象的并发访问。

trans-unit.target: 一个可以原子化更新的对象引用。

trans-unit.source: An object reference that may be updated atomically. See the VarHandle specification for descriptions of the properties of atomic accesses.
trans-unit.target: 可以原子更新的对象引用。有关原子访问的属性的描述，请参见 VarHandle 规范。

trans-unit.target: 允许用户从一个限定的范围内进行选择的对象。例如,滑块可用于选择0至100之间的数字。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties for each parameter marker in a PreparedStatement object. For some queries and driver implementations, the data that would be returned by a ParameterMetaData object may not be available until the PreparedStatement has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可用于获取有关 PreparedStatement 对象中每个参数标记的类型和属性的信息。对于某些查询和驱动程序实现，在执行 PreparedStatement 之前，由 ParameterMetaData 对象返回的数据可能不可用。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties of the columns in a ResultSet object.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取有关 ResultSet 对象中列的类型和属性的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties of the columns in a ResultSet object. The following code fragment creates the ResultSet object rs, creates the ResultSetMetaData object rsmd, and uses rsmd to find out how many columns rs has and whether the first column in rs can be used in a WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取有关 ResultSet 对象中列的类型和属性的信息的对象。以下代码片段创建 ResultSet 对象rs，创建 ResultSetMetaData 对象rsmd，并使用rsmd找出rs包含多少列，以及rs中的第一列是否可以在 WHERE 子句中使用。

trans-unit.source: An object that configures how to copy or move a file.

trans-unit.source: An object that configures how to open or create a file.
trans-unit.target: 一个配置如何打开或创建文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains information about the columns in a RowSet object.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关 RowSet 对象中列的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains information about the columns in a RowSet object. This interface is an extension of the ResultSetMetaData interface with methods for setting the values in a RowSetMetaData object. When a RowSetReader object reads data into a RowSet object, it creates a RowSetMetaData object and initializes it using the methods in the RowSetMetaData interface. Then the reader passes the RowSetMetaData object to the rowset.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关 RowSet 对象中列的信息的对象。此接口是 ResultSetMetaData 接口的扩展，其中包含用于设置 RowSetMetaData 对象中的值的方法。当 RowSetReader 对象将数据读取到 RowSet 对象中时，它将创建 RowSetMetaData 对象，并使用 RowSetMetaData 接口中的方法对其进行初始化。然后，阅读器将 RowSetMetaData 对象传递给行集。

trans-unit.source: An object that creates new threads on demand.
trans-unit.target: 一个根据需求创建新线程的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that creates new threads on demand. Using thread factories removes hardwiring of calls to new Thread, enabling applications to use special thread subclasses, priorities, etc.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要创建新线程的对象。使用线程工厂可以消除对 new Thread 的调用的繁琐工作，从而使应用程序可以使用特殊的线程子类，优先级等。

trans-unit.source: An object that creates new threads on demand. Using thread factories removes hardwiring of calls to new Thread, enabling applications to use special thread subclasses, priorities, etc.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要创建新线程的对象。使用线程工厂可以消除对 new Thread 的调用的繁琐工作，从而使应用程序可以使用特殊的线程子类，优先级等。

trans-unit.source: An object that currently exists in the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 当前存在于目标虚拟机中的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that currently exists in the target VM. An ObjectReference mirrors only the object itself and is not specific to any Field or LocalVariable to which it is currently assigned. An ObjectReference can have 0 or more references from field(s) and/or variable(s).
trans-unit.target: 目标VM中当前存在的对象。 ObjectReference仅镜像对象本身，并且不特定于当前为其分配的任何 Field 或 LocalVariable 。一个ObjectReference可以有0个或多个来自字段和/或变量的引用。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes a dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述动态操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes a dynamic operation. Dynalink defines a set of standard operations with the StandardOperation class, as well as a way to express the target namespace(s) of an operation on an object using NamespaceOperation and finally a way to attach a fixed target name to an operation using NamedOperation. When presenting examples in this documentation, we will refer to standard operations using their name (e.g. GET), to namespace operations by separating their base operation with a colon from their namespace (e.g. GET:PROPERTY), or in case of multiple namespaces we will further separate those with the vertical line character (e.g. GET:PROPERTY|ELEMENT), and finally we will refer to named operations by separating the base operation and the name with the colon character (e.g. GET:PROPERTY|ELEMENT:color).
trans-unit.target: 描述动态操作的对象。 Dynalink定义了一组与所述标准操作的 StandardOperation 类，以及要表达的目标的方式 namespace(s) 的操作的使用对象上 NamespaceOperation 和最后的方式使用，以一个固定的目标名附加到操作 NamedOperation 。在本文档中介绍示例时，我们将使用其名称（例如 GET ）来引用标准操作，通过使用冒号将其基本操作与其名称空间（例如 GET:PROPERTY ）分开来引用名称空间操作，或者在使用多个名称空间的情况下进一步将带有竖线字符的字符分开（例如 GET:PROPERTY|ELEMENT ），最后，我们将基本操作和名称之间用冒号分开（例如 GET:PROPERTY|ELEMENT:color ），以引用命名操作。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes a namespace that is the target of a dynamic operation on an object.
trans-unit.target: 描述作为对象的动态操作目标的命名空间的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes a namespace that is the target of a dynamic operation on an object. Every object can have one or more namespaces. Dynalink defines a set of standard namespaces with the StandardNamespace enum. Operations that need to specify a namespace they operate on can be expressed using NamespaceOperation.
trans-unit.target: 描述名称空间的对象，该名称空间是对对象进行动态操作的目标。每个对象可以具有一个或多个命名空间。Dynalink使用 StandardNamespace 枚举定义了一组标准名称空间。可以使用 NamespaceOperation 来表达需要指定对其进行操作的名称空间的操作。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the value of a file attribute that can be set atomically when creating a new file or directory by invoking the createFile or createDirectory methods.
trans-unit.target: 封装文件属性值的对象，当通过调用 createFile 或 createDirectory 方法创建新文件或目录时，可以原子设置该文件属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the value of a file attribute that can be set atomically when creating a new file or directory by invoking the createFile or createDirectory methods.
trans-unit.target: 封装文件属性值的对象，当通过调用 createFile 或 createDirectory 方法创建新文件或目录时，可以原子设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that executes submitted Runnable tasks.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，执行已提交 Runnable 任务。

trans-unit.source: An object that executes submitted Runnable tasks. This interface provides a way of decoupling task submission from the mechanics of how each task will be run, including details of thread use, scheduling, etc. An Executor is normally used instead of explicitly creating threads. For example, rather than invoking new Thread(new RunnableTask()).start() for each of a set of tasks, you might use:
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，执行已提交 Runnable 任务。该接口提供了一种将任务提交与每个任务将如何运行的机制（包括线程使用，调度的详细信息）的机制脱钩的方法。通常使用 Executor 程序来代替显式创建线程。例如，您可以使用以下方法来代替为一组任务中的每一个调用 new Thread(new RunnableTask()).start() ：

trans-unit.source: An object that executes submitted Runnable tasks. This interface provides a way of decoupling task submission from the mechanics of how each task will be run, including details of thread use, scheduling, etc. An Executor is normally used instead of explicitly creating threads. For example, rather than invoking new Thread(new(RunnableTask())).start() for each of a set of tasks, you might use:
