trans-unit.source: An object that fills up space in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: 填充用户界面空间的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that fills up space in a user interface. It is often used in interfaces to tweak the spacing between components, but serves no other purpose.
trans-unit.target: 填充用户界面空间的对象。在界面中,它通常用于调整组件之间的间距,但没有其他用途。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Blob interface
trans-unit.target: 实现 Blob 接口的对象

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Clob interface
trans-unit.target: 实现 Clob 接口的对象

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the NClob interface
trans-unit.target: 实现 NClob 接口的对象

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the RowSetWriter interface, called a
trans-unit.target: 实现 RowSetWriter 接口的对象，称为

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the SQLXML interface
trans-unit.target: 实现 SQLXML 接口的对象

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the java.security.Principal interface typically also implements this interface to provide a means for comparing that object to a specified Subject.
trans-unit.target: 实现 java.security.Principal 接口的对象通常还实现此接口，以提供一种将该对象与指定的 Subject 比较的方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Enumeration interface generates a series of elements, one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现Enumeration接口的对象会产生一系列的元素,一次一个。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the Enumeration interface generates a series of elements, one at a time. Successive calls to the nextElement method return successive elements of the series.
trans-unit.target: 实现Enumeration接口的对象会生成一系列元素，一次生成一个。连续调用 nextElement 方法将返回该系列的连续元素。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the URIResolver interface, or null.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现URIResolver接口的对象,或者为空。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements this interface contains the information needed to act as source input (XML source or transformation instructions).
trans-unit.target: 实现该接口的对象包含作为源输入(XML源或转换指令)所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements this interface contains the information needed to build a transformation result tree.
trans-unit.target: 实现该接口的对象包含了构建转换结果树所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements this interface is the runtime representation of processed transformation instructions.
trans-unit.target: 实现该接口的对象是处理过的转换指令的运行时表示。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements this interface that can be called by the processor to turn a URI used in document(), xsl:import, or xsl:include into a Source object.
trans-unit.target: 实现这个接口的对象,可以被处理器调用,将 document()、xsl:import 或 xsl:include 中使用的 URI 转为 Source 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a child of a page tab list.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,它是一个页面标签列表的子对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a child of a page tab list. Its sole child is the panel that is to be presented to the user when the user selects the page tab from the list of tabs in the page tab list.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,它是页面标签列表的子对象。它的唯一子对象是当用户从页面选项卡列表中选择页面选项卡时,显示给用户的面板。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a hyperlink should support the AccessibleHyperlink interface. An object that implements this interface will be returned by calling the getLink method on an AccessibleHypertext object.
trans-unit.target: 作为超链接的对象应支持AccessibleHyperlink接口。将通过在AccessibleHypertext对象上调用getLink方法来返回实现此接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that is used to identify a generic SQL type, called a JDBC type or a vendor specific data type.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于标识通用SQL类型的对象,称为JDBC类型或供应商特定的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: An object that maps keys to values.
trans-unit.target: 一个将键映射到值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that maps keys to values. A map cannot contain duplicate keys; each key can map to at most one value.
trans-unit.target: 一个将键映射到值的对象。一个映射不能包含重复的键,每个键最多只能映射到一个值。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be registered with a watch service so that it can be watched for changes and events.
trans-unit.target: 可以在监视服务中注册的对象，以便可以监视其更改和事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be used to locate a file in a file system.
trans-unit.target: 可用于定位文件系统中的文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that may be used to locate a file in a file system. It will typically represent a system dependent file path.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于定位文件系统中的文件的对象。它通常代表一个依赖于系统的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: An object that may hold resources (such as file or socket handles) until it is closed.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以保留资源(如文件或套接字句柄)的对象,直到它被关闭。

trans-unit.source: An object that may hold resources (such as file or socket handles) until it is closed. The close() method of an AutoCloseable object is called automatically when exiting a try-with-resources block for which the object has been declared in the resource specification header. This construction ensures prompt release, avoiding resource exhaustion exceptions and errors that may otherwise occur.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭之前可以保存资源（例如文件或套接字句柄）的对象。当退出 try -with-resources块（已在资源规范头中为其声明对象）时，将自动调用 AutoCloseable 对象的 close() 方法。这种构造可确保及时释放，避免资源耗尽异常和可能发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: An object that may hold resources (such as file or socket handles) until it is closed. The close() method of an AutoCloseable object is called automatically when exiting a try-with-resources block for which the object has been declared in the resource specification header. This construction ensures prompt release, avoiding resource exhaustion exceptions and errors that may otherwise occur.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭之前可以保存资源（例如文件或套接字句柄）的对象。当退出 try -with-resources块（已在资源规范头中为其声明对象）时，将自动调用 AutoCloseable 对象的 close() 方法。这种构造可确保及时释放，避免资源耗尽异常和可能发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents a list of objects to the user and allows the user to select one or more of them.
trans-unit.target: 一个向用户展示对象列表并允许用户选择其中一个或多个对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents a list of objects to the user and allows the user to select one or more of them. A list is usually contained within a scroll pane.
trans-unit.target: 向用户展示对象列表并允许用户选择其中一个或多个对象的对象。列表通常包含在一个滚动窗格中。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents a series of panels (or page tabs), one at a time, through some mechanism provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,通过对象提供的某种机制,一次呈现一系列的面板(或页面标签)。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents a series of panels (or page tabs), one at a time, through some mechanism provided by the object. The most common mechanism is a list of tabs at the top of the panel. The children of a page tab list are all page tabs.
trans-unit.target: 通过对象提供的某种机制,一次呈现一系列面板(或页面标签)的对象。最常见的机制是面板顶部的标签页列表。一个页面标签列表的子代都是页面标签。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents an element in a list.
trans-unit.target: 一个在列表中呈现元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents an element in a list. A list is usually contained within a scroll pane.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中显示元素的对象。列表通常包含在一个滚动窗格中。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents text to the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个向用户展示文本的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that presents text to the user. The text is usually editable by the user as opposed to a label.
trans-unit.target: 一个向用户展示文本的对象。与标签不同,文本通常是可以由用户编辑的。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with an object in a filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 提供与文件系统中的对象关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with an object in a filesystem. This interface is extended or implemented by specific attribute views that define the attributes supported by the view. A specific attribute view will typically define type-safe methods to read or update the attributes that it supports.
trans-unit.target: 提供与文件系统中的对象关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图的对象。此接口由定义该视图支持的属性的特定属性视图扩展或实现。特定的属性视图通常将定义类型安全的方法，以读取或更新其支持的属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides hooks for connection pool management.
trans-unit.target: 一个为连接池管理提供钩子的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides hooks for connection pool management. A PooledConnection object represents a physical connection to a data source. The connection can be recycled rather than being closed when an application is finished with it, thus reducing the number of connections that need to be made.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于连接池管理的挂钩的对象。甲 PooledConnection 对象表示数据源的物理连接。连接可以被回收而不是在应用程序完成时被关闭，从而减少了需要建立的连接数量。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides information about another object.
trans-unit.target: 提供另一对象信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides information about another object. The accessibleDescription property of the tool tip is often displayed to the user in a small "help bubble" when the user causes the mouse to hover over the object associated with the tool tip.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关另一个对象的信息的对象。当用户使鼠标悬停在与工具提示关联的对象上时，工具提示的 accessibleDescription 属性通常以小的“帮助提示”显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides support for distributed transactions.
trans-unit.target: 一个为分布式事务提供支持的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides support for distributed transactions. An XAConnection object may be enlisted in a distributed transaction by means of an XAResource object. A transaction manager, usually part of a middle tier server, manages an XAConnection object through the XAResource object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对分布式事务的支持的对象。可以通过 XAResource 对象将 XAConnection 对象加入到分布式事务中。事务管理器通常是中间层服务器的一部分，它通过 XAResource 对象管理 XAConnection 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that registers to be notified of events generated by a PooledConnection object.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，注册该对象以通知 PooledConnection 对象生成的事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that registers to be notified of events that occur on PreparedStatements that are in the Statement pool.
trans-unit.target: 一个注册的对象,用于通知声明池中的PreparedStatements发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a precompiled SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表预编译的SQL语句的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object the user can manipulate to tell the application to do something.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户可以操作的对象,告诉应用程序要做什么。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the backing file stores
trans-unit.target: 遍历备份文件存储的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the entries in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,用于遍历目录中的条目。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the entries in a directory. A directory stream allows for the convenient use of the for-each construct to iterate over a directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于遍历目录中的条目的对象。目录流允许方便地使用for-each结构来遍历一个目录。

trans-unit.source: An object to iterate over the root directories
trans-unit.target: 一个用于遍历根目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to lookup user and group principals by name.
trans-unit.target: 用于按名称查找用户和组负责人的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to lookup user and group principals by name. A UserPrincipal represents an identity that may be used to determine access rights to objects in a file system. A GroupPrincipal represents a group identity. A UserPrincipalLookupService defines methods to lookup identities by name or group name (which are typically user or account names). Whether names and group names are case sensitive or not depends on the implementation. The exact definition of a group is implementation specific but typically a group represents an identity created for administrative purposes so as to determine the access rights for the members of the group. In particular it is implementation specific if the namespace for names and groups is the same or is distinct. To ensure consistent and correct behavior across platforms it is recommended that this API be used as if the namespaces are distinct. In other words, the lookupPrincipalByName should be used to lookup users, and lookupPrincipalByGroupName should be used to lookup groups.
trans-unit.target: 用于按名称查找用户和组主体的对象。甲 UserPrincipal 表示可被用来确定在一个文件系统对象的访问权的标识。甲 GroupPrincipal 表示组标识。甲 UserPrincipalLookupService 定义了方法查找通过名称或组名称标识（其通常是用户或帐户名）。名称和组名称是否区分大小写取决于实现。组的确切定义是特定于实现的，但通常，组代表为管理目的而创建的身份，以便确定组成员的访问权限。特别是名称空间是特定于实现的名称和组相同或不同。为了确保跨平台的一致和正确的行为，建议像命名空间一样使用此API。换句话说，应使用 lookupPrincipalByName 查找用户，并使用 lookupPrincipalByGroupName 查找组。

trans-unit.source: An object to lookup user and group principals by name. A UserPrincipal represents an identity that may be used to determine access rights to objects in a file system. A GroupPrincipal represents a group identity. A UserPrincipalLookupService defines methods to lookup identities by name or group name (which are typically user or account names). Whether names and group names are case sensitive or not depends on the implementation. The exact definition of a group is implementation specific but typically a group represents an identity created for administrative purposes so as to determine the access rights for the members of the group. In particular it is implementation specific if the namespace for names and groups is the same or is distinct. To ensure consistent and correct behavior across platforms it is recommended that this API be used as if the namespaces are distinct. In other words, the lookupPrincipalByName should be used to lookup users, and lookupPrincipalByGroupName should be used to lookup groups.
trans-unit.target: 用于按名称查找用户和组主体的对象。甲 UserPrincipal 表示可被用来确定在一个文件系统对象的访问权的标识。甲 GroupPrincipal 表示组标识。甲 UserPrincipalLookupService 定义了方法查找通过名称或组名称标识（其通常是用户或帐户名）。名称和组名称是否区分大小写取决于实现。组的确切定义是特定于实现的，但通常，组代表为管理目的而创建的身份，以便确定组成员的访问权限。特别是名称空间是特定于实现的名称和组相同或不同。为了确保跨平台的行为一致且正确，建议像命名空间一样使用此API。换句话说， lookupPrincipalByName 应该用于查找用户，而 lookupPrincipalByGroupName 应该用于查找组。

trans-unit.source: An object to which char sequences and values can be appended.
trans-unit.target: 可以附加 char 序列和值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to which char sequences and values can be appended. The Appendable interface must be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to receive formatted output from a Formatter.
trans-unit.target: 可以附加 char 序列和值的对象。在 Appendable 接口必须由任何类，其实例意在从接收格式化输出来实现 Formatter 。

trans-unit.source: An object used to coordinate the closing of a selectable channel created by readWriteSelectableChannel.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，用于协调由 readWriteSelectableChannel 创建的可选通道的关闭。

trans-unit.source: An object used to coordinate the closing of a selectable channel created by readWriteSelectableChannel.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，用于协调由 readWriteSelectableChannel 创建的可选通道的关闭。

trans-unit.source: An object used to indicate how much of a task has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示任务完成了多少的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object used to present an icon or short string in an interface.
trans-unit.target: 用于在界面中显示一个图标或短字符串的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object used to present hierarchical information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 用于向用户展示层次信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object used to present hierarchical information to the user. The individual nodes in the tree can be collapsed and expanded to provide selective disclosure of the tree's contents.
trans-unit.target: 用于向用户展示层次信息的对象。树中的单个节点可以折叠和展开,以提供树的内容的选择性披露。

trans-unit.source: An object used to present information in terms of rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 用来显示行和列信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object used to present information in terms of rows and columns. An example might include a spreadsheet application.
trans-unit.target: 用于以行和列的形式显示信息的对象。例如,电子表格应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An object usually contained in a menu that presents an action the user can choose.
trans-unit.target: 一个通常包含在菜单中的对象,呈现出一个用户可以选择的动作。

trans-unit.source: An object usually contained in a menu that presents an action the user can choose. For example, the "Cut" menu item in an "Edit" menu would be an action the user can select to cut the selected area of text in a document.
trans-unit.target: 通常包含在一个菜单中的对象,它提供了一个用户可以选择的操作。例如,"编辑 "菜单中的 "剪切 "菜单项就是一个用户可以选择的操作,以剪切文档中选定的文本区域。

trans-unit.source: An object usually contained in a menu to provide a visual and logical separation of the contents in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 通常包含在菜单中的一个对象,为菜单中的内容提供视觉和逻辑上的分离。

trans-unit.source: An object usually contained in a menu to provide a visual and logical separation of the contents in a menu. For example, the "File" menu of an application might contain menu items for "Open," "Close," and "Exit," and will place a separator between "Close" and "Exit" menu items.
trans-unit.target: 通常包含在菜单中的一个对象,为菜单中的内容提供视觉和逻辑上的分离。例如,应用程序的 "文件 "菜单可能包含 "打开"、"关闭 "和 "退出 "的菜单项,并在 "关闭 "和 "退出 "菜单项之间放置一个分隔符。

trans-unit.source: An object usually drawn at the top of the primary dialog box of an application that contains a list of menus the user can choose from.
trans-unit.target: 通常在应用程序的主对话框顶部绘制的对象,它包含了一个用户可以选择的菜单列表。

trans-unit.source: An object usually drawn at the top of the primary dialog box of an application that contains a list of menus the user can choose from. For example, a menu bar might contain menus for "File," "Edit," and "Help."
trans-unit.target: 通常画在应用程序的主对话框顶部的对象,它包含了用户可以选择的菜单列表。例如,一个菜单栏可能包含 "文件"、"编辑 "和 "帮助 "的菜单。

trans-unit.source: An object usually found inside a menu bar that contains a list of actions the user can choose from.
trans-unit.target: 通常在菜单栏内发现的对象,包含一个用户可以选择的操作列表。

trans-unit.source: An object usually found inside a menu bar that contains a list of actions the user can choose from. A menu can have any object as its children, but most often they are menu items, other menus, or rudimentary objects such as radio buttons, check boxes, or separators. For example, an application may have an "Edit" menu that contains menu items for "Cut" and "Paste."
trans-unit.target: 通常在菜单栏中找到的对象,它包含了用户可以选择的操作列表。一个菜单可以有任何对象作为它的子对象,但最常见的是菜单项、其他菜单或基本对象,如单选按钮、复选框或分隔符。例如,一个应用程序可能有一个 "编辑 "菜单,其中包含 "剪切 "和 "粘贴 "的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: An object usually used in a scroll pane.
trans-unit.target: 通常在滚动窗格中使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object usually used in a scroll pane. It represents the portion of the entire data that the user can see. As the user manipulates the scroll bars, the contents of the viewport can change.
trans-unit.target: 通常在滚动窗格中使用的对象。它代表整个数据中用户可以看到的部分。当用户操作滚动条时,视口的内容可以改变。

trans-unit.source: An object usually used to allow a user to incrementally view a large amount of data.
trans-unit.target: 通常用于允许用户增量查看大量数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object usually used to allow a user to incrementally view a large amount of data. Usually used only by a scroll pane.
trans-unit.target: 通常用于允许用户递增查看大量数据的对象。通常仅由滚动窗格使用。

trans-unit.source: An object whose monitor is used to lock this node.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,其监控器用于锁定此节点。

trans-unit.source: An object whose monitor is used to lock this node. This object is used in preference to the node itself to reduce the likelihood of intentional or unintentional denial of service due to a locked node. To avoid deadlock, a node is
trans-unit.target: 一个对象,其监视器用于锁定该节点。这个对象优先于节点本身使用,以减少由于锁定节点而导致的有意或无意拒绝服务的可能性。为了避免死锁,一个节点被

trans-unit.source: An object written via writeUnshared is always serialized in the same manner as a newly appearing object (an object that has not been written to the stream yet), regardless of whether or not the object has been written previously.
trans-unit.target: 通过writeUnshared写入的对象总是以与新出现的对象(尚未写入流的对象)相同的方式进行序列化,而不管该对象之前是否被写入。

trans-unit.source: An object/attributes pair for returning the result of DirStateFactory.getStateToBind().
trans-unit.target: 一个对象/属性对,用于返回DirStateFactory.getStateToBind()的结果。

trans-unit.source: An observable object can have one or more observers. An observer may be any object that implements interface Observer. After an observable instance changes, an application calling the Observable's notifyObservers method causes all of its observers to be notified of the change by a call to their update method.
trans-unit.target: 一个可观察对象可以具有一个或多个观察者。观察者可以是实现接口 Observer 的任何对象。可观察实例发生更改后，调用 Observable 的 notifyObservers 方法的应用程序将通过调用其 update 方法来通知其所有观察者更改。

trans-unit.source: An obsolete subclass of ExportException.
trans-unit.target: ExportException 的过时子类。

trans-unit.source: An occurrence in a target VM that is of interest to a debugger.
trans-unit.target: 在目标虚拟机中发生的调试器感兴趣的事件。

trans-unit.source: An occurrence in a target VM that is of interest to a debugger. Event is the common superinterface for all events (examples include BreakpointEvent, ExceptionEvent, ClassPrepareEvent). When an event occurs, an instance of Event as a component of an EventSet is enqueued in the VirtualMachine's EventQueue.
trans-unit.target: 调试器感兴趣的目标VM中的事件。事件是所有事件的通用超级接口（示例包括 BreakpointEvent ， ExceptionEvent ， ClassPrepareEvent ）。发生事件时， EventSet Event的实例作为EventSet的组成部分加入到 VirtualMachine 的 EventQueue 中。

trans-unit.source: An opaque component paints every pixel within its rectangular bounds. A non-opaque component paints only a subset of its pixels or none at all, allowing the pixels underneath it to "show through". Therefore, a component that does not fully paint its pixels provides a degree of transparency.
trans-unit.target: 一个不透明的组件会绘制其矩形范围内的每个像素。非不透明的组件只画出其像素的一个子集,或者根本不画,允许其下面的像素 "透视"。因此,不完全绘制像素的组件提供了一定程度的透明度。

trans-unit.source: An opaque component paints every pixel within its rectangular region. A non-opaque component paints only some of its pixels, allowing the pixels underneath it to "show through". A component that does not fully paint its pixels therefore provides a degree of transparency.
trans-unit.target: 一个不透明的组件会绘制其矩形区域内的每个像素。非不透明的组件只画出部分像素,允许下面的像素 "透视"。因此,不完全绘制像素的组件提供了一定程度的透明度。

trans-unit.target: 一个开放的模块。一个开放的模块不声明任何开放的包,但产生的模块被视为所有包都是开放的。

trans-unit.source: An open square bracket '['.

trans-unit.target: 一个模块的打开包装。

trans-unit.source: An optional string that can be displayed on the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 可在进度条上显示的可选字符串。

trans-unit.source: An optional string that can be displayed on the progress bar. The default is null. Setting this to a non-null value does not imply that the string will be displayed. To display the string, paintString must be true.
trans-unit.target: 可以在进度条上显示的可选字符串。默认值为 null 。将此值设置为非 null 值并不意味着将显示该字符串。要显示字符串， paintString 必须为 true 。

trans-unit.target: 可选的依赖于系统的前缀字符串，例如磁盘驱动器说明符，UNIX根目录为 "/" ，Microsoft Windows UNC路径名为 "\\\\" ，以及

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking deque based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的双端队列。

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking queue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的阻塞队列。

trans-unit.source: An optionally-bounded blocking queue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out). The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time. New elements are inserted at the tail of the queue, and the queue retrieval operations obtain elements at the head of the queue. Linked queues typically have higher throughput than array-based queues but less predictable performance in most concurrent applications.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的可选绑定的阻塞队列。此队列对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是已在队列中停留最长时间的元素。队列的尾部是最短时间出现在队列中的元素。新元素插入到队列的尾部，并且队列检索操作在队列的开头获取元素。链接队列通常比基于阵列的队列具有更高的吞吐量，但是在大多数并发应用程序中，可预测的性能较差。

trans-unit.target: 一个有序的集合(也称为

trans-unit.source: An output location may be used to write files in either a package-oriented organization or in a module-oriented organization.
trans-unit.target: 输出位置可用于在面向包的组织或面向模块的组织中写入文件。

trans-unit.source: An output stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being written.
trans-unit.target: 一个输出流,也维护着被写入数据的校验和。

trans-unit.source: An output stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being written. The checksum can then be used to verify the integrity of the output data.
trans-unit.target: 一个输出流,它还维护着所写数据的校验和。然后,可利用该校验和来验证输出数据的完整性。

trans-unit.target: W3C的XML签名语法和处理建议中定义的XML SignedInfo 元素的表示形式。XML模式定义定义为：

trans-unit.source: An representation of the XML SignedInfo element as defined in the W3C Recommendation for XML-Signature Syntax and Processing.
trans-unit.target: W3C的XML签名语法和处理建议中定义的XML SignedInfo 元素的表示形式。

trans-unit.target: W3C的XML签名语法和处理建议中定义的XML SignedInfo 元素的表示形式。XML模式定义定义为：

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue of Delayed elements, in which an element can only be taken when its delay has expired.
trans-unit.target: Delayed 元素的无限制阻塞队列，在该队列中，只有在其延迟到期时才可以使用该元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue of Delayed elements, in which an element can only be taken when its delay has expired. The head of the queue is that Delayed element whose delay expired furthest in the past. If no delay has expired there is no head and poll will return null. Expiration occurs when an element's getDelay(TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS) method returns a value less than or equal to zero. Even though unexpired elements cannot be removed using take or poll, they are otherwise treated as normal elements. For example, the size method returns the count of both expired and unexpired elements. This queue does not permit null elements.
trans-unit.target: Delayed 元素的无限制阻塞队列，在该队列中，只有在其延迟到期时才可以使用该元素。队列的开头是该 Delayed 元素，其延迟在过去最远时过期。如果没有延迟，则没有头，并且 poll 将返回 null 。当元素的 getDelay(TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS) 方法返回的值小于或等于零时，就会发生过期。即使无法使用 take 或 poll 删除未过期的元素，也将它们视为普通元素。例如 size 方法返回过期和未过期元素的计数。此队列不允许空元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue that uses the same ordering rules as class PriorityQueue and supplies blocking retrieval operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个无界阻塞队列，它使用与类 PriorityQueue 相同的排序规则，并提供阻塞检索操作。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded blocking queue that uses the same ordering rules as class PriorityQueue and supplies blocking retrieval operations. While this queue is logically unbounded, attempted additions may fail due to resource exhaustion (causing OutOfMemoryError). This class does not permit null elements. A priority queue relying on natural ordering also does not permit insertion of non-comparable objects (doing so results in ClassCastException).
trans-unit.target: 一个无界阻塞队列，它使用与类 PriorityQueue 相同的排序规则，并提供阻塞检索操作。尽管此队列在逻辑上是不受限制的，但是尝试尝试添加可能会由于资源耗尽而失败（导致 OutOfMemoryError ）。此类不允许使用 null 元素。依赖自然顺序的优先级队列也不允许插入不可比较的对象（这样做会导致 ClassCastException ）。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded TransferQueue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界 TransferQueue 。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded TransferQueue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out) with respect to any given producer. The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time for some producer. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time for some producer.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界 TransferQueue 。此队列针对任何给定的生产者对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是某个生产者在队列中停留时间最长的元素。队列的尾部是某个生产者在最短时间内进入队列的元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded concurrent deque based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无限制并发双端队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded concurrent deque based on linked nodes. Concurrent insertion, removal, and access operations execute safely across multiple threads. A ConcurrentLinkedDeque is an appropriate choice when many threads will share access to a common collection. Like most other concurrent collection implementations, this class does not permit the use of null elements.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无限制并发双端队列。并发插入，删除和访问操作可在多个线程之间安全地执行。一个 ConcurrentLinkedDeque 是当许多线程共享访问一个共同的集合一个合适的选择。与大多数其他并发集合实现一样，此类不允许使用 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded priority queue based on a priority heap.
trans-unit.target: 基于优先级堆的无界优先级队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded priority queue based on a priority heap. The elements of the priority queue are ordered according to their natural ordering, or by a Comparator provided at queue construction time, depending on which constructor is used. A priority queue does not permit null elements. A priority queue relying on natural ordering also does not permit insertion of non-comparable objects (doing so may result in ClassCastException).
trans-unit.target: 基于优先级堆的无界优先级队列。优先级队列的元素根据其自然顺序进行排序，或者由队列构造时提供的 Comparator 进行排序，具体取决于所使用的构造函数。优先级队列不允许 null 元素。依赖自然顺序的优先级队列也不允许插入不可比较的对象（这样做可能会导致 ClassCastException ）。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded thread-safe queue based on linked nodes.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界线程安全队列。

trans-unit.source: An unbounded thread-safe queue based on linked nodes. This queue orders elements FIFO (first-in-first-out). The head of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the longest time. The tail of the queue is that element that has been on the queue the shortest time. New elements are inserted at the tail of the queue, and the queue retrieval operations obtain elements at the head of the queue. A ConcurrentLinkedQueue is an appropriate choice when many threads will share access to a common collection. Like most other concurrent collection implementations, this class does not permit the use of null elements.
trans-unit.target: 基于链接节点的无界线程安全队列。该队列对元素FIFO（先进先出）进行排序。队列的开头是已在队列中停留最长时间的元素。队列的尾部是最短时间出现在队列中的元素。新元素插入到队列的尾部，并且队列检索操作在队列的开头获取元素。一 ConcurrentLinkedQueue 是当许多线程共享访问一个共同的集合一个合适的选择。与大多数其他并发集合实现一样，此类不允许使用 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: An underlying security service specifies this as the optionType to a ConfirmationCallback constructor if it requires a confirmation which can be answered with either OK or CANCEL.
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的安全服务指定以此为 optionType 到 ConfirmationCallback 构造函数，如果它需要一个确认其可与回答 OK 或 CANCEL 。

trans-unit.source: An underlying security service specifies this as the optionType to a ConfirmationCallback constructor if it requires a confirmation which can be answered with either YES or NO.
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的安全服务指定此作为 optionType 到 ConfirmationCallback 构造如果它要求的确认，其可以与任一回答 YES 或 NO 。

trans-unit.source: An underlying security service specifies this as the optionType to a ConfirmationCallback constructor if it requires a confirmation which can be answered with either YES, NO or CANCEL.
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的安全服务指定此作为 optionType 到 ConfirmationCallback 构造如果它要求的确认，其可以与任一回答 YES ， NO 或 CANCEL 。

trans-unit.source: An undoable edit happened
trans-unit.target: 发生了一个不可挽回的编辑

trans-unit.source: An unknown snippet.
trans-unit.target: 一个不知名的片段。

trans-unit.source: An unknown snippet. The only SubKind for Snippet.Kind.ERRONEOUS.
trans-unit.target: 未知片段。唯一 SubKind 为 Snippet.Kind.ERRONEOUS 。

trans-unit.source: An unlock (synchronized block or method exit) of a monitor
trans-unit.target: 监视器的解锁（ synchronized 块或方法退出）

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable collection is not necessarily immutable. If the contained elements are mutable, the entire collection is clearly mutable, even though it might be unmodifiable. For example, consider two unmodifiable lists containing mutable elements. The result of calling list1.equals(list2) might differ from one call to the next if the elements had been mutated, even though both lists are unmodifiable. However, if an unmodifiable collection contains all immutable elements, it can be considered effectively immutable.
trans-unit.target: 不可修改的集合不一定是不变的。如果所包含的元素是可变的，则整个集合显然是可变的，即使它可能不可修改。例如，考虑两个包含可变元素的不可修改列表。如果两个元素都是不可修改的，则调用 list1.equals(list2) 的结果可能会因一次元素更改而有所不同。但是，如果不可修改的集合包含所有不可变元素，则可以将其视为有效不可变。

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable list containing the names of the file's user-defined
trans-unit.target: 一个不可修改的列表,其中包含了文件的用户定义名

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable list of the installed file system providers. The list contains at least one element, that is the default file system provider
trans-unit.target: 已安装的文件系统提供者的不可修改的列表。列表中至少包含一个元素,即默认的文件系统提供者。

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable list of the integers represented in the version number
trans-unit.target: 一个不可修改的版本号代表的整数列表。

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable set of the names of the supported file attribute views
trans-unit.target: 一组不可修改的支持的文件属性视图名称。

trans-unit.source: An unnamed module does not have a name. There is an unnamed module for each ClassLoader, obtained by invoking its getUnnamedModule method. All types that are not in a named module are members of their defining class loader's unnamed module.
trans-unit.target: 未命名的模块没有名称。每个 ClassLoader 都有一个未命名的模块，可通过调用其 getUnnamedModule 方法获得。所有不在命名模块中的类型都是其定义类加载器的未命名模块的成员。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified behavior will be caused if the id parameter of any particular ActionEvent instance is not in the range from ACTION_FIRST to ACTION_LAST.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何特定 ActionEvent 实例的 id 参数不在 ACTION_FIRST 到 ACTION_LAST 的范围内，则将导致未指定的行为。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified behavior will be caused if the id parameter of any particular AdjustmentEvent instance is not in the range from ADJUSTMENT_FIRST to ADJUSTMENT_LAST.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何特定 AdjustmentEvent 实例的 id 参数不在 ADJUSTMENT_FIRST 到 ADJUSTMENT_LAST 的范围内，则将导致未指定的行为。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified behavior will be caused if the id parameter of any particular ComponentEvent instance is not in the range from COMPONENT_FIRST to COMPONENT_LAST.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何特定 ComponentEvent 实例的 id 参数不在 COMPONENT_FIRST 到 COMPONENT_LAST 的范围内，则将导致未指定的行为。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified behavior will be caused if the id parameter of any particular ContainerEvent instance is not in the range from CONTAINER_FIRST to CONTAINER_LAST.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何特定 ContainerEvent 实例的 id 参数不在 CONTAINER_FIRST 到 CONTAINER_LAST 的范围内，则将导致未指定的行为。

trans-unit.source: An unspecified behavior will be caused if the id parameter of any particular FocusEvent instance is not in the range from FOCUS_FIRST to FOCUS_LAST.

trans-unit.source: Annotation processing happens in a sequence of rounds. On each round, a processor may be asked to process a subset of the annotations found on the source and class files produced by a prior round. The inputs to the first round of processing are the initial inputs to a run of the tool; these initial inputs can be regarded as the output of a virtual zeroth round of processing. If a processor was asked to process on a given round, it will be asked to process on subsequent rounds, including the last round, even if there are no annotations for it to process. The tool infrastructure may also ask a processor to process files generated implicitly by the tool's operation.
trans-unit.target: 批注处理是按一系列回合进行的。在每一轮中，可能会要求处理器处理在上一轮产生的源文件和类文件中找到的注释的子集。第一轮处理的输入是工具运行的初始输入。这些初始输入可以视为虚拟第零轮处理的输出。如果要求处理器在给定的回合中进行处理，则即使没有注释要处理，也将要求其在后续回合中进行处理，包括最后一轮。工具基础结构还可能要求处理器处理由工具的操作隐式生成的文件。

trans-unit.source: Annotation processing happens in a sequence of rounds. On each round, a processor may be asked to process a subset of the annotations found on the source and class files produced by a prior round. The inputs to the first round of processing are the initial inputs to a run of the tool; these initial inputs can be regarded as the output of a virtual zeroth round of processing. If a processor was asked to process on a given round, it will be asked to process on subsequent rounds, including the last round, even if there are no annotations for it to process. The tool infrastructure may also ask a processor to process files generated implicitly by the tool's operation.
trans-unit.target: 批注处理是按一系列回合进行的。在每一轮中，可能会要求处理器处理在上一轮产生的源文件和类文件中找到的注释的子集。第一轮处理的输入是工具运行的初始输入。这些初始输入可以视为虚拟第零轮处理的输出。如果要求处理器在给定的回合中进行处理，即使没有注释要处理，也将要求其在后续回合中进行处理，包括最后一轮。工具基础结构还可能要求处理器处理由工具操作隐式生成的文件。

trans-unit.source: Annotation retention policy. The constants of this enumerated type describe the various policies for retaining annotations. They are used in conjunction with the Retention meta-annotation type to specify how long annotations are to be retained.
trans-unit.target: 注释保留策略。此枚举类型的常量描述了保留注释的各种策略。它们与“ Retention 元注释类型一起使用，以指定保留注释多长时间。

trans-unit.source: Another advantage of a JdbcRowSet object is that it can be used to make a ResultSet object scrollable and updatable. All RowSet objects are by default scrollable and updatable. If the driver and database being used do not support scrolling and/or updating of result sets, an application can populate a JdbcRowSet object with the data of a ResultSet object and then operate on the JdbcRowSet object as if it were the ResultSet object.
trans-unit.target: JdbcRowSet 对象的另一个优点是，它可以用于使 ResultSet 对象可滚动和可更新。默认情况下，所有 RowSet 对象都是可滚动和可更新的。如果所使用的驱动程序和数据库不支持滚动和/或结果集更新，应用程序可以填充 JdbcRowSet 用的数据对象 ResultSet 对象，然后将上操作 JdbcRowSet 对象，好像它是在 ResultSet 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Another advantage of the CachedRowSet class is that it makes it possible to retrieve and store data from sources other than a relational database. The reader for a rowset can be implemented to read and populate its rowset with data from any tabular data source, including a spreadsheet or flat file. Because both a CachedRowSet object and its metadata can be created from scratch, a component that acts as a factory for rowsets can use this capability to create a rowset containing data from non-SQL data sources. Nevertheless, it is expected that most of the time, CachedRowSet objects will contain data that was fetched from an SQL database using the JDBC API.
trans-unit.target: CachedRowSet 类的另一个优点是，它使从关系数据库以外的其他来源检索和存储数据成为可能。行集的读取器可以实现为使用来自任何表格数据源（包括电子表格或平面文件）的数据读取并填充其行集。由于 CachedRowSet 对象及其元数据都可以从头开始创建，因此充当行集工厂的组件可以使用此功能来创建包含来自非SQL数据源的数据的行集。但是，预计在大多数情况下， CachedRowSet 对象将包含使用JDBC API从SQL数据库中获取的数据。

trans-unit.source: Another example would be a multi-column component, such as a JTable, in which the column sizes are not all equal. The JTable might use a single SizeSequence object to store the widths and X positions of all the columns. The JTable could then use the SizeSequence object to find the column corresponding to a certain position. The JTable could update the SizeSequence object whenever one or more column sizes changed.
trans-unit.target: 另一个示例是多列组件，例如 JTable ，其中的列大小并非全部相等。在 JTable 中可以使用单一 SizeSequence 对象来存储宽度和所有列的X位置。然后， JTable 可以使用 SizeSequence 对象找到与某个位置相对应的列。只要更改一个或多个列的大小， JTable 就可以更新 SizeSequence 对象。

trans-unit.source: Another job for the cell renderer is in helping to determine sizing information for the list. By default, the list's ListUI determines the size of cells by asking the cell renderer for its preferred size for each list item. This can be expensive for large lists of items. To avoid these calculations, you can set a fixedCellWidth and fixedCellHeight on the list, or have these values calculated automatically based on a single prototype value:
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器的另一项工作是帮助确定列表的大小信息。默认情况下，列表的 ListUI 通过向单元格渲染器询问每个列表项的首选大小来确定单元格的大小。对于大量商品而言，这可能会很昂贵。为了避免这些计算，您可以在列表上设置 fixedCellWidth 和 fixedCellHeight ，或者根据单个原型值自动计算这些值：

trans-unit.source: Another thing to note about these examples is how they use the method acceptChanges. It is this method that propagates changes in a CachedRowSet object back to the underlying data source, calling on the RowSet object's writer internally to write changes to the data source. To do this, the writer has to incur the expense of establishing a connection with that data source. The preceding two code fragments call the method acceptChanges immediately after calling updateRow or insertRow. However, when there are multiple rows being changed, it is more efficient to call acceptChanges after all calls to updateRow and insertRow have been made. If acceptChanges is called only once, only one connection needs to be established.
trans-unit.target: 关于这些示例的另一件事要注意的是它们如何使用方法 acceptChanges 。正是这种方法将 CachedRowSet 对象中的更改传播回基础数据源，从而在内部调用 RowSet 对象的writer来将更改写入数据源。为此，编写者必须承担与该数据源建立连接的费用。前面的两个代码片段在调用 updateRow 或 insertRow 之后立即调用方法 acceptChanges 。但是，当有多个行被更改时，在对 updateRow 和 insertRow 的所有调用之后，调用 acceptChanges 效率更高。已制成。如果 acceptChanges 仅被调用一次，则仅需要建立一个连接。

trans-unit.target: 另一个线程通过调用 notify 方法或 notifyAll 方法来通知在该对象的监视器上等待的线程唤醒。

trans-unit.source: Another typical usage would be to divide a problem into N parts, describe each part with a Runnable that executes that portion and counts down on the latch, and queue all the Runnables to an Executor. When all sub-parts are complete, the coordinating thread will be able to pass through await. (When threads must repeatedly count down in this way, instead use a CyclicBarrier.)
trans-unit.target: 另一个典型用法是将问题分为N个部分，用可运行部分描述每个部分，该可运行部分执行该部分并在锁存器上递减计数，然后将所有可运行对象排入执行器。当所有子部分都完成时，协调线程将能够通过等待。（当线程必须以此方式反复递减计数时，请使用 CyclicBarrier 。）

trans-unit.source: Another use of dynamically typesafe views is debugging. Suppose a program fails with a ClassCastException, indicating that an incorrectly typed element was put into a parameterized collection. Unfortunately, the exception can occur at any time after the erroneous element is inserted, so it typically provides little or no information as to the real source of the problem. If the problem is reproducible, one can quickly determine its source by temporarily modifying the program to wrap the collection with a dynamically typesafe view. For example, this declaration:
trans-unit.target: 动态类型安全视图的另一种用法是调试。假设程序失败，并显示 ClassCastException ，表明将错误键入的元素放入了参数化集合中。不幸的是，异常可能会在插入错误元素后的任何时间发生，因此，它通常很少或根本没有提供有关问题真正根源的信息。如果问题是可重现的，则可以通过临时修改程序以使用动态类型安全视图包装集合来快速确定其来源。例如，此声明：

trans-unit.source: Another way the character set can be specified is in the document itself. This requires reading the document prior to determining the character set that is desired. To handle this, it is expected that the EditorKit.read operation throw a ChangedCharSetException which will be caught. The read is then restarted with a new Reader that uses the character set specified in the ChangedCharSetException (which is an IOException).
trans-unit.target: 可以指定字符集的另一种方法是在文档本身中。这要求在确定所需的字符集之前先阅读文档。为了解决这个问题，期望 EditorKit .read操作抛出一个 ChangedCharSetException 异常，该异常将被捕获​​。然后，使用新的Reader重新启动读取，该Reader使用 ChangedCharSetException 中指定的字符集（这是 IOException ）。

trans-unit.source: Another way to obtain the nominal description of a value is to ask the value itself. A Constable is a type whose values can describe themselves in nominal form as a ConstantDesc. Fundamental types such as String and Class implement Constable, as can user-defined classes. Entities that generate classfiles (such as compilers) can introspect over constable objects to obtain a more efficient way to represent their values in classfiles.
trans-unit.target: 获得值的名义描述的另一种方法是询问值本身。甲 Constable 是一个类型，其值可以描述自己名义形式作为 ConstantDesc 。基本类型（例如 String 和 Class )实现 Constable ，而用户定义的类也可以实现Constable。生成类文件的实体（例如编译器）可以对常量对象进行自省，以获得更有效的方式来表示类文件中的值。

trans-unit.source: Any RowSet object can be added to a JoinRowSet object to become part of an SQL JOIN relationship. This means that both connected and disconnected RowSet objects can be part of a JOIN. RowSet objects operating in a connected environment (JdbcRowSet objects) are encouraged to use the database to which they are already connected to establish SQL JOIN relationships between tables directly. However, it is possible for a JdbcRowSet object to be added to a JoinRowSet object if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 可以将任何 RowSet 对象添加到 JoinRowSet 对象中，以成为SQL JOIN 关系的一部分。这意味着已连接和已断开连接的 RowSet 对象都可以成为 JOIN 的一部分。鼓励在连接的环境中操作的 RowSet 对象（ JdbcRowSet 对象）使用已经连接到它们的数据库直接在表之间建立SQL JOIN 关系。但是，如有必要，可以将 JdbcRowSet 对象添加到 JoinRowSet 对象中。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to read object data which exceeds the boundaries of the custom data written by the corresponding writeObject method will cause an OptionalDataException to be thrown with an eof field value of true. Non-object reads which exceed the end of the allotted data will reflect the end of data in the same way that they would indicate the end of the stream: bytewise reads will return -1 as the byte read or number of bytes read, and primitive reads will throw EOFExceptions. If there is no corresponding writeObject method, then the end of default serialized data marks the end of the allotted data.
trans-unit.target: 任何试图读取对象数据的行为,如果超过了对应的writeObject方法所写入的自定义数据的边界,都会导致抛出一个eof字段值为true的 OptionalDataException。超出分配数据结束的非对象读取将以同样的方式反映数据流的结束:按字节读取将返回-1作为读取的字节或字节数,基元读取将抛出eofExceptions。如果没有相应的writeObject方法,那么默认序列化数据的结束标志着分配数据的结束。

trans-unit.source: Any change to the compilation status of a snippet is reported with a SnippetEvent. There are three major kinds of changes to the status of a snippet: it can created with eval, it can be dropped from the active source state with JShell.drop(jdk.jshell.Snippet), and it can have its status updated as a result of a status change in another snippet. For example: given js, an instance of JShell, executing js.eval("int x = 5;") will add the variable x to the source state and will generate an event describing the creation of a VarSnippet for x. Then executing js.eval("int timesx(int val) { return val * x; }") will add a method to the source state and will generate an event describing the creation of a MethodSnippet for timesx. Assume that varx holds the snippet created by the first call to eval, executing js.drop(varx) will generate two events: one for changing the status of the variable snippet to DROPPED and one for updating the method snippet (which now has an unresolved reference to x).
trans-unit.target: 代码段编译状态的任何更改都将通过 SnippetEvent 报告。代码段状态有三种主要变化：可以使用 eval 创建，可以使用 JShell.drop(jdk.jshell.Snippet) 从活动源状态删除它，并且可以将其状态更新为另一个代码段中状态更改的结果。例如：给定 js ，它是 JShell 的实例，执行 js.eval("int x = 5;") 会将变量 x 添加到源状态，并将生成一个事件，该事件描述为 x 创建 VarSnippet 。然后执行 js.eval("int timesx(int val) { return val * x; }") 将一个方法添加到源状态和将生成描述的创建的事件 MethodSnippet 为 timesx 。假设 varx 保存了第一次调用 eval 创建的代码段，执行 js.drop(varx) 将生成两个事件：一个事件用于将变量代码段的状态更改为 DROPPED ，另一个事件用于更新方法代码段（现在有未解决的方法）参考 x ）。

trans-unit.source: Any models subclassed from this class and used in conjunction with a text component that has a look and feel implementation that is derived from BasicTextUI may be safely updated asynchronously, because all access to the View hierarchy is serialized by BasicTextUI if the document is of type AbstractDocument. The locking assumes that an independent thread will access the View hierarchy only from the DocumentListener methods, and that there will be only one event thread active at a time.
trans-unit.target: 可以安全地异步更新任何从此类继承的子模型，并与具有从BasicTextUI派生的外观实现的文本组件结合使用的模型，因为如果文档的类型为 AbstractDocument ，则对View层次结构的所有访问都将由BasicTextUI序列化。。锁定假定独立线程只能从DocumentListener方法访问View层次结构，并且一次将只有一个事件线程处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Any number of listeners can be added with this method. The same listener can be added more than once with the same or different values for the filter and handback. There is no special treatment of a duplicate entry. For example, if a listener is registered twice with no filter, then its handleNotification method will be called twice for each notification.

trans-unit.source: Any number of these empty spaces can be replaced by using the setCorner method to add a component to a particular corner. (Note: The same component cannot be added to multiple corners.) This is useful if there's some extra decoration or function you'd like to add to the scroll pane. The size of each corner component is entirely determined by the size of the headers and/or scroll bars that surround it.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用 setCorner 方法将组件添加到特定的角来替换任意数量的这些空白空间。（注意：不能将同一组件添加到多个角。）如果要添加一些额外的装饰或功能到滚动窗格中，这将很有用。每个角组件的大小完全由围绕它的标题和/或滚动条的大小确定。

trans-unit.source: Any object that wishes to be notified of changes to the scroll bar's value should implement AdjustmentListener, an interface defined in the package java.awt.event. Listeners can be added and removed dynamically by calling the methods addAdjustmentListener and removeAdjustmentListener.
trans-unit.target: 希望收到滚动条值更改通知的任何对象都应实现 AdjustmentListener ，这是在包 java.awt.event 中定义的接口。可以通过调用方法 addAdjustmentListener 和 removeAdjustmentListener 来动态添加和删除侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Any object with a reference to a context may examine that context's environment. Sensitive information such as clear-text passwords should not be stored there unless the implementation is known to protect it.
trans-unit.target: 任何对上下文有引用的对象都可以检查该上下文的环境。敏感的信息,如明文密码,不应存储在那里,除非知道实施是为了保护它。

trans-unit.source: Any occurrence of a leading quote, an escape preceding any meta character, an escape at the end of a component, or a component separator character in an unquoted component must be preceded by an escape character when that component is being composed into a composite name string. Alternatively, to avoid adding escape characters as described, the entire component can be quoted using matching single quotes or matching double quotes. A single quote occurring within a double-quoted component is not considered a meta character (and need not be escaped), and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 当一个组件被组成一个复合名称字符串时,在任何元字符前出现的前引号、转义符、组件末尾的转义符或未引用的组件中出现的组件分隔符都必须在前面加上转义符。另外,为了避免添加所述转义字符,可以使用匹配的单引号或匹配的双引号对整个组件进行引用。在双引号组件中出现的单引号不被视为元字符(不需要转义),反之亦然。

trans-unit.target: 任何选项都可以使用本方法的布尔值(false)来禁用。

trans-unit.target: 任何选项都可以使用这个方法用一个Boolean.FALSE禁用。

trans-unit.source: Any or all of these may be provided, depending on the values of the <var>http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces</var> and the <var>http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes</var> properties:
trans-unit.target: 根据 <var>http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces</var> 和 <var>http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes</var> 属性的值，可以提供其中的任何一个或全部：

trans-unit.source: Any other attribute settings for the characters in the specified range are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 指定范围内字符的任何其他属性设置都会被清除。

trans-unit.source: Any other attribute settings for the specified character are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符的其他属性设置将被清除。

trans-unit.source: Any other kind.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他种类。

trans-unit.source: Any other type
trans-unit.target: 任何其他类型

trans-unit.source: Any other value for the scrollbars argument is invalid and will result in this text area being created with scrollbar visibility equal to the default value of SCROLLBARS_BOTH.
trans-unit.target: scrollbars 参数的任何其他值都是无效的，并且将导致在此文本区域中创建的滚动条可见性等于 SCROLLBARS_BOTH 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Any other value of scope defined in the default ScriptContext of the ScriptEngine.
trans-unit.target: 在 ScriptEngine 的默认 ScriptContext 中定义的范围的任何其他值。

trans-unit.source: Any other views in the JRootPane view hierarchy are ignored.
trans-unit.target: JRootPane 视图层次结构中的任何其他视图都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Any out of range field values are either normalized in lenient mode or detected as an invalid value in non-lenient mode.
trans-unit.target: 任何超出范围的字段值要么在宽松模式下被标准化,要么在非宽松模式下被检测为无效值。

trans-unit.source: Any outstanding asynchronous operations upon this channel will complete with the exception AsynchronousCloseException. After a channel is closed, further attempts to initiate asynchronous I/O operations complete immediately with cause ClosedChannelException.
trans-unit.target: 该通道上所有未完成的异步操作都将完成，并带有 AsynchronousCloseException 异常。关闭通道后，进一步的启动异步I / O操作的尝试将立即完成，原因为 ClosedChannelException 。

trans-unit.source: Any package name provided as a String parameter to methods in ClassLoader must be either the empty string (denoting an unnamed package) or a fully qualified name as defined by
trans-unit.target: 作为 ClassLoader 中方法的 String 参数提供的任何程序包名称都必须是空字符串（表示未命名的程序包）或由定义的完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: Any parameter that is not set (or is set to null) will be set to the default value for that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 任何未设置（或设置为 null ）的参数将被设置为该参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Any parameter that is not set (or is set to null) will be set to the default value for that parameter. The default value for the date parameter is null, which indicates the current time when the path is validated. The default for the remaining parameters is the least constrained.
trans-unit.target: 任何未设置（或设置为 null ）的参数将被设置为该参数的默认值。 date 参数的默认值为 null ，它表示验证路径的当前时间。其余参数的默认约束最少。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their imageStarted method, followed by calls to their imageProgress method as the read progresses. Finally their imageComplete method will be called. IIOReadUpdateListener objects may be updated at other times during the read as pixels are decoded. Finally, IIOReadWarningListener objects will receive notification of any non-fatal warnings that occur during decoding.
trans-unit.target: 任何注册 IIOReadProgressListener 对象将通过调用它们的通知 imageStarted 方法，然后通过调用其 imageProgress 中的方法读取进展。最后，将调用他们的 imageComplete 方法。 IIOReadUpdateListener 对象可能在读取过程中的其他时间更新，因为像素已解码。最后， IIOReadWarningListener 对象将接收有关在解码期间发生的任何非致命警告的通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their sequenceStarted method once. Then, for each image decoded, there will be a call to imageStarted, followed by calls to imageProgress as the read progresses, and finally to imageComplete. The sequenceComplete method will be called after the last image has been decoded. IIOReadUpdateListener objects may be updated at other times during the read as pixels are decoded. Finally, IIOReadWarningListener objects will receive notification of any non-fatal warnings that occur during decoding.
trans-unit.target: 任何已注册的 IIOReadProgressListener 对象都将通过调用它们的 sequenceStarted 方法来得到通知。然后，对于每个图像的解码，将有一个呼叫 imageStarted ，然后调用 imageProgress 中作为读取进展，最后到 imageComplete 。该 sequenceComplete 最后的图像已被解码后的方法将被调用。 IIOReadUpdateListener 对象可能在读取过程中的其他时间更新，因为像素已解码。最后， IIOReadWarningListener 对象将接收有关在解码期间发生的任何非致命警告的通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered IIOReadProgressListener objects will be notified by calling their thumbnailStarted, thumbnailProgress, and thumbnailComplete methods.
trans-unit.target: 任何已注册的 IIOReadProgressListener 对象都将通过调用它们的 thumbnailStarted ， thumbnailProgress 和 thumbnailComplete 方法得到通知。

trans-unit.source: Any registered readUpdateListeners are ignored, as there is no BufferedImage, but all other listeners are called exactly as they are for the read method.
trans-unit.target: 因为没有 BufferedImage ，所以将忽略所有已注册的 readUpdateListener ，但是所有其他侦听器的调用方式均与 read 方法的调用方式完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Any registered readUpdateListeners are ignored, as there is no BufferedImage, but all other listeners are called exactly as they are for the read method.
trans-unit.target: 因为没有 BufferedImage ，所以将忽略所有已注册的 readUpdateListener ，但所有其他侦听器的调用方式都与 read 方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining milliseconds after determining the day, hour, minute and second are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 确定日、时、分、秒后剩余的毫秒将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining milliseconds after determining the year and month are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 确定年月后剩余的毫秒将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining types BQ+1..BX (if Q<X) will determine the resulting loop handle's parameter types (A...).
trans-unit.target: 任何剩余的 BQ+1..BX 类型（如果 Q<X ）将确定结果循环句柄的参数类型 (A...) 。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining unresolved fields are cross-checked against any date and/or time that was resolved. Thus, an earlier stage would resolve (year + month + day-of-month) to a date, and this stage would check that day-of-week was valid for the date.
trans-unit.target: 任何剩余的未解决的字段都会与已解决的日期和/或时间进行交叉检查。因此,较早的阶段会将(年+月+月日)解析为一个日期,而这个阶段会检查周日对日期是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Any root module is not observable.
trans-unit.target: 任何根模块都无法观察。

trans-unit.source: Any sequence of letters not specified above, unrecognized letter or reserved character will throw an exception. Future versions may add to the set of patterns. It is recommended to use single quotes around all characters that you want to output directly to ensure that future changes do not break your application.
trans-unit.target: 任何未在上面指定的字母序列、未识别的字母或保留的字符都将抛出一个异常。未来的版本可能会对该模式集进行添加。建议在所有要直接输出的字符周围使用单引号,以确保未来的更改不会破坏你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Any standard RowSet implementation may implement the Joinable interface in order to be added to a JoinRowSet object. Implementing this interface gives a RowSet object the ability to use Joinable methods, which set, retrieve, and get information about match columns. An application may add a RowSet object that has not implemented the Joinable interface to a JoinRowSet object, but to do so it must use one of the JoinRowSet.addRowSet methods that takes both a RowSet object and a match column or an array of RowSet objects and an array of match columns.
trans-unit.target: 任何标准 RowSet 实现都可以实现 Joinable 接口，以便将其添加到 JoinRowSet 对象中。实现此接口使 RowSet 对象能够使用 Joinable 方法，该方法可设置，检索和获取有关匹配列的信息。应用程序可以将尚未实现 Joinable 接口的 RowSet 对象添加到 JoinRowSet 对象中，但这样做必须使用 JoinRowSet.addRowSet 方法之一，该方法同时使用 RowSet 对象和match列或 RowSet 数组 对象和匹配列数组。

trans-unit.source: Any string that conforms to these two rules is a valid path name.
trans-unit.target: 任何符合这两条规则的字符串都是有效的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) upon this socket will throw a SocketException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此套接字上在 receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) 中阻塞的任何线程都将抛出 SocketException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) upon this socket will throw a SocketException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此套接字上在 receive(java.net.DatagramPacket) 中阻塞的任何线程都将抛出 SocketException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation (readPacket or writePacket) will throw a ClosedConnectionException).
trans-unit.target: 当前在I / O操作中阻塞的任何线程（ readPacket 或 writePacket ）都将抛出 ClosedConnectionException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation upon this channel will receive an AsynchronousCloseException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此通道上的I / O操作中阻塞的任何线程都将收到 AsynchronousCloseException 。

trans-unit.source: Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation upon this socket will throw a SocketException.
trans-unit.target: 当前在此套接字上的I / O操作中阻塞的任何线程都将抛出 SocketException 。

trans-unit.source: Any top-level window can be marked not to be blocked by modal dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 任何顶层窗口都可以标记为不被模态对话框屏蔽。

trans-unit.source: Any top-level window can be marked not to be blocked by modal dialogs. This is called "modal exclusion". This enum specifies the possible modal exclusion types.
trans-unit.target: 任何顶层窗口都可以被标记为不被模态对话框屏蔽。这就是所谓的 "模态排除"。这个枚举指定了可能的模态排除类型。

trans-unit.source: Any type that represents any of the 5 other types listed below.
trans-unit.target: 代表下列其他5种类型的任何一种类型。

trans-unit.source: Any type that represents any of the 5 other types listed below. Maps to XPathEvaluationResult.
trans-unit.target: 代表下面列出的5种其他类型中的任何一种的任何类型。映射到 XPathEvaluationResult 。

trans-unit.source: Any uncancelled keys still associated with this selector are invalidated, their channels are deregistered, and any other resources associated with this selector are released.
trans-unit.target: 任何仍与该选择器相关联的未取消的键都无效,其通道被取消注册,与该选择器相关联的任何其他资源被释放。

trans-unit.source: Any unmatched quote is treated as closed at the end of the given pattern. For example, pattern string "'{0}" is treated as pattern "'{0}'".
trans-unit.target: 在给定模式的末尾，任何不匹配的引号将被视为封闭的。例如，模式字符串 "'{0}" 被视为模式 "'{0}'" 。

trans-unit.source: Any unrecognized letter is an error. Any non-letter character, other than '[', ']', '{', '}', '#' and the single quote will be output directly. Despite this, it is recommended to use single quotes around all characters that you want to output directly to ensure that future changes do not break your application.
trans-unit.target: 任何未被识别的字母都是错误的。除了'['、']'、'{'、'}'、'#'和单引号之外,任何非字母字符都将直接输出。尽管如此,建议在所有要直接输出的字符周围使用单引号,以确保未来的更改不会破坏你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Any unsupported key read from the keytab is ignored and not included in the result.
trans-unit.target: 从keytab读取的任何不支持的键都会被忽略,并且不包括在结果中。

trans-unit.source: Any valid number, uses Character.isDigit.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效数字均使用 Character.isDigit 。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches EST, CST, MST, or PST, ignoring case, is recognized as referring to the time zone in North America that is five, six, seven, or eight hours west of Greenwich, respectively. Any word that matches EDT, CDT, MDT, or PDT, ignoring case, is recognized as referring to the same time zone, respectively, during daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 EST, CST, MST 或 PST 匹配的单词都被认为是指北美格林威治以西五个小时，六个小时，七个小时或八个小时的时区。在夏令时期间，忽略大小写的任何与 EDT, CDT, MDT 或 PDT 匹配的单词都被认为分别指向相同的时区。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches GMT, UT, or UTC, ignoring case, is treated as referring to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 GMT, UT 或 UTC 匹配的单词都被视为引用UTC。

trans-unit.source: Any word that matches any prefix of SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, or SATURDAY, ignoring case, is ignored. For example, sat, Friday, TUE, and Thurs are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 忽略大小写的任何与 SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY 或 SATURDAY 的前缀匹配的单词都将被忽略。例如， sat, Friday, TUE 和 Thurs 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Anything else results in an invalid edit
trans-unit.target: 其他的结果都是无效的编辑

trans-unit.source: Anything.
trans-unit.target: Anything.

trans-unit.source: Apart from the checking of type descriptors, a method handle's capability to call its underlying method is unrestricted. If a method handle is formed on a non-public method by a class that has access to that method, the resulting handle can be used in any place by any caller who receives a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 除了检查类型描述符之外,方法句柄调用其底层方法的能力是不受限制的。如果一个方法句柄是由一个可以访问该方法的类在一个非公共方法上形成的,那么由此产生的句柄可以被任何收到引用的调用者在任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the semantics described above, the precise algorithm used in the implicitly provided implementation is unspecified and is subject to change. The implementation may or may not use calls to the particular methods listed, and may or may not perform comparisons in the order of component declaration.
trans-unit.target: 除了上面描述的语义之外,隐式提供的实施例中使用的精确算法是未指定的,并且可能会改变。该实施例可能使用或不使用对所列特定方法的调用,也可能不按组件声明的顺序进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Apart from type descriptor checks, a VarHandles's capability to access it's variables is unrestricted. If a VarHandle is formed on a non-public variable by a class that has access to that variable, the resulting VarHandle can be used in any place by any caller who receives a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 除了类型描述符检查之外,VarHandles访问它的变量的能力是不受限制的。如果一个VarHandle是由一个可以访问该变量的类在一个非公共变量上形成的,那么产生的VarHandle可以被任何收到它的引用的调用者在任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: Apart from type descriptor checks, a method handle's capability to call its underlying method is unrestricted. If a method handle is formed on a non-public method by a class that has access to that method, the resulting handle can be used in any place by any caller who receives a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 除了类型描述符检查之外,方法句柄调用其底层方法的能力是不受限制的。如果一个方法句柄是由一个可以访问该方法的类在一个非公开的方法上形成的,那么由此产生的句柄可以被任何收到对它的引用的调用者在任何地方使用。
